M6我明白了。好吧。我买一份。告诉我，一旦你们收到她的申请表，申请的处理过程需要多长时间？申请费要多少钱？I see. Ok, I’ll take one. Could you tell me, once you receive herapplication, how long will it take to process? How much is theapplication fee?
E7We can’t begin processing her application unless the applicationform is signed and every question is answered. Also, the supportingdocuments must be attached and the visa application fee must be paid.The current fee is 1,470 Australian dollars and there’s no refund givenfor unsuccessful applications.
M7我明白了。那么，如果我们递交了所有的文件和表格，并且付了申请费。申请受理要多长时间？I understand. So how long is the processing time once we havesubmitted all the documents and forms and paid the fee?
E8I’m afraid that the average timeframe for processing applications inthe aged parent category is currently 24 to 48 months.
M8我明白了。好的，我要一份小册子。再回家和我的家人商量一下。谢谢。All right. I see. I’ll take a booklet. Then I’ll go home and discussit with my family. Thank you.

entry.title: 入籍咨询
entry.content:
The following dialogue is between Mr. Guan and Allan, an immigrationofficer. Mr Guan is enquiring about applying for Australian citizenship.* * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1你好，我今天来是想咨询一下入籍的事。我有几个问题想向你请教。Hello! I’m here today to enquire about citizenship. I’ve got somequestions to ask you.
M1Sure, I can help you with that. I’m Allan, a citizenship departmentofficer. Please go ahead.
E2我去年 2月成为了永久居民。我现在在犹豫要不要入籍。你可以告诉我成为澳大利亚公民有哪些好处呢？I became a permanent resident last February. Now I’m consideringwhether I should apply for citizenship. Can you tell me the benefits ofbecoming an Australian citizen?
M2Australian citizenship offers a range of benefits. You can vote infederal and state or territory elections and in a referendum and seekelection to parliament. You can also apply for work in the AustralianPublic Service or in the Australian Defence Force.
E3同样，我也可以持有澳大利亚护照了吧。凭着这本护照，我可以免签去很多国家，对吗？我对于我来说是个比较实际的好处。Also I can receive an Australian passport with which I can visitmany countries visa-free, right? For me this is a real benefit.
M3That’s correct. An Australian passport will enable you to visit over100 countries on a visa-free basis. Also, you can receive help fromAustralian consular and embassy officials while overseas.
E4嗯…那何时可以申请入籍呢？是当我成为永久居民满两年吗？还是有其他什么具体规定？Hmm… Then when can I apply for Australian citizenship? Is it after Ihave been a permanent resident for two years or are there otherconditions?
M4Actually, you have to meet the residence requirements. This meansyou must have 4 years lawful residence in Australia. This period mustinclude 12 months as a permanent resident immediately before making anapplication for Australian citizenship. Also, you must have absencesfrom Australia of no more than 12 months in total in the 4 years priorto application, including not more than 90 days in the 12 monthsimmediately prior to the application.
E5除了我的身份证件以外，我还需要递交哪些文件呢？是否需要无犯罪记录证明呢？这个申请不会向永久居留的申请那样等那么久吧？What documents should I submit besides my identification documents?Do I need to provide a certificate of no criminal record? Will theprocessing time of this application be as long as the application forpermanent residency?
M5Yes you need to include documents proving you are of good character.I can’t tell you the exact processing time but I think it should be muchshorter than the processing time for permanent residency.
E6最后我要参加入籍仪式对吧。你可以跟我说一下入籍仪式有哪些内容呢？The final step of citizenship is to attend the citizenship ceremony,right? Could you tell me what will happen at the ceremony?
M6After you are seated there will be a formal introduction, speechesand an address that precedes making the pledge. Then the presidingofficer will ask you to repeat the pledge of commitment out loud. Onceyou have made the pledge you will be an Australian citizen.

entry.title: 工签续签
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Mr. Liu (L), who wants to extend hisworking visa and an immigration officer, Haydn (H). * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1So, your visa expires next month, in 25 days actually and you wantan extension. On what grounds are you applying for an extension?
M1我持有工作签证在这里已经有十一个月了。在这期间，我不但交了很多税，还经常去教堂做义工。I have been here on a working visa for eleven months. During thisperiod, I not only paid a lot of taxes, but also often volunteered at achurch.
E2I’m afraid you need to include some reasons other than those in yourapplication. Is there an employer who can guarantee your employment andcan claim that he needs your skills?
M2收到全球金融危机的冲击，我之前的雇主不得不裁减员工。不幸的是我也是其中一个。所以现在没有工作。如果你给我些时间，我可以找到。Because of the impact of the global financial crisis, my previousemployer had to cut staff. Unfortunately, I was one of them. So I don’thave an employer now but if you give me more time I can find one.
E3It’s not up to me to give you time to do that. You do have 35 daysafter the expiry of your visa to find another job. However, if youaren’t able to secure employment within 35 days, you simply must leave.There is no other way.
M3我明白。但是我原想你能对我的案子区别对待。澳洲这么大，多一个人，又有什么关系？I understand that but I thought you might treat my case as anexception. Australia is such a big country. Does it really matter tokeep one more person here?
E4You don’t seem to understand that this situation is out of mycontrol. I’m not the one who makes the law. I’m afraid only the Ministerhas the discretion to approve special applications.
M4求求你。你一定有什么可以帮我的。我有家庭，他们得靠我。如果我不寄钱回家他们会挨饿。我实在是很绝望。Please. You must be able to help me in some way. I have a family whodepends on me and they will starve if I stop sending money back home.I’m really desperate!
E5Please sir. You are making this very difficult. There’s simplynothing I can do to help you. If you can find someone to sponsor youwithin the next two months you might be okay. Otherwise, I’m afraid youhave to leave Australia.
M5我怎样才能找到一位雇主呢？一般人雇主都不大喜欢快过期的签证。有谁你认识的可以帮助我？How can I find an employer? Most employers would frown upon peoplewith expiring visas. Do you know someone who can help me?
E6Why don’t you try your local community? Find out if there is a groupthat can help you. There are usually community welfare groups or you cancheck the Chinese newspaper.
M6对了。这我可没想到。你讲得没错。一定办法的。谢谢你的指点。Yes. I hadn’t thought of that. You are right. There must be asolution to this. Thanks for your advice.

entry.title: 签证拒签
entry.content:
The following dialogue is between Mr. Lu, and Henry, an immigrationofficer. Mr. Lu is enquiring about the visa rejection decision on behalfof his family. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good afternoon, Mr. Lu. I understand that you have come in toclarify some matters regarding your family’s visa applications.
M1是的，没错。我们刚受到了你们移民局发来的签证拒签通知。我们很震惊，也很失望。Yes, that’s right. We have just received the visa rejection noticefrom you. We feel shocked and very disappointed.
E2I’m sorry to hear that. However, we cannot comment on the rejectionof their applications apart from the information contained in thedecision letter.
M2我知道，你之前就说过了。今天我想问的是移民部是否能重新考虑这个案子。我赚钱养国内的家人。我很久没见到他们了。I know, you told me that already. What I’m asking you is whetheryour department can reconsider the case. I am supporting my family backin China. I haven’t seen them for a long time.
E3That’s really quite unfortunate. However, all we can do is toconsider applications, then accept or refuse them. One path for youwould be to encourage your family to reapply.
M3好吧，那他们重新申请了会怎样？会有什么不同吗？他们第一次申请时就满足了所有要求，但你们还是拒绝批签。Ok and what if they reapply? Will it make any difference? They metall the requirements in the first application but you still refused togrant them the visa.
E4I have already said that I can’t comment. I appreciate yourcircumstances and I sincerely wish that I could help. Believe me, I meetpeople in your position every day and I have nothing but sympathy forthem.
M4我不是对你无礼，但我觉得你有点不讲道理。一开始你告诉我你们部门可能有失误，然后你又说我家人的文件有问题。你也不告诉我是哪些问题。Look, I don’t want to be rude but I think you are being a bitunreasonable. First you told me your department might have made amistake. Then you said that there are some problems with theirdocuments. But you won’t tell me what these problems are.
E5No, no. Let me make this clear. With respect, Mr. Lu, I think youhave the facts a little distorted. I said that I suspected that therehad been some problems with the documentation. If you want to keep onarguing, this interview is a waste of your time and mine.
M5好，那我冷静一下。但他们在家等移民部的回复已经浪费了几个月了。想想他们吧。你让他们建立起很高的期望，然后又让这期望破灭。至少给我们一个机会吧。Fine. I’ll calm down, but my family have wasted months sittingaround waiting for a reply from your department. Please think of them.You built up their expectations and then you destroyed them. Give us achance at least.
E6Nobody’s expectations were built up. They should not have made anyassumptions until their visas were granted.
M6我要拿头撞墙了。给我个直截了当的答案，是还是否。他们重新申请签证到底有没有意义？你一定能给我点有用的信息。Oh, come on! Just give me a straight answer – yes or no. Is thereany point in them reapplying for a visa? Surely you can give me someidea.

entry.title: 庇护签证
entry.content:
The following dialogue is between Mr. Guan and Adam, an immigrationofficer. Mr. Guan is enquiring about applying for a protection visa. * **
IDOriginalTranslated
E1你好，我想申请庇护签证，希望你能帮我。Hello! I’d like to apply for a protection visa and I hope you canhelp me with that.
M1Well, I will see what I can do. First, please let me ask a fewquestions. When did you come to Australia and what visa are you on?
E2我 2008 年 2 月持 573 学生签证来悉尼大学读传媒学的硕士。I came to Australia in February 2008 on a student visa subclass 573.I came here to do a master’s degree majoring in media at the Universityof Sydney.
M2So on what grounds are you applying for a protection visa then? Youshould be aware that you must be a refugee as defined by the RefugeeConvention.
E3我在中国时是个记者，来澳以后在博客上写了很多批评中国政府的文章。我担心回国以后会因政治原因受到迫害。I was a journalist in China. After I came here I wrote many articleson my blog, criticising the Chinese government. I’m worried that when Igo back there I will be persecuted for political reasons.
M3How can you be sure you will be persecuted? Publishing some articlesalone seems insufficient to support the claim that you will be in dangerback home.
E4我的家人已经被监视了！我现在已不敢和他们联系。我一个同事因为发表一些揭露政府丑闻的文章已失踪了。My family has been under surveillance! I’m too afraid to contactthem now. One of my colleagues has gone missing for publishing somearticles exposing the government scandals.
M4You should include documentary evidence to support your claims inyour application. If the documents are not written in English, you willneed to have them translated by an accredited translator. It’s stronglyrecommended that you seek legal advice before lodging theapplication.
E5如果我的签证批准了，我可以把国内的父母接来澳洲吗？因为我会不可能回国了。If my visa application is approved, can my parents come to Australiato join me as I will never get the chance to go back to my country?
M5You can sponsor your immediate family, such as your spouse andchildren to come to Australia when you are granted with the protectionvisa. However parents are not included. You can choose to apply throughthe parent migration program after you have had the protection visa forover two years.
E6那如果我的申请不被批准会怎样？我能够有上诉重申吗？要知道，我要是被捕了，有可能会受到睡眠剥夺等非人道的折磨。What if my application is rejected? Can I have my case reviewed? Youknow, if I am arrested, I may face various kinds of inhumane torturesuch
M6Yes. You have the right to seek a review of this decision by anindependent tribunal, either the Refugee Review Tribunal (RRT) or theAdministrative Appeals Tribunal (AAT).as sleep deprivation.

entry.title: 逾期打工
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Mr. Liu, who has overstayed his visa andan immigration officer Henry。 * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1You are here because your six-month tourist visa expired threemonths ago. We also understand you have been working in violation ofyour visa conditions. Do you have any comments to make?
M1我的签证是过期了。但我觉得我应该可以留下来。你说我打工违反了签证规定，那就更荒谬了，这不是为澳大利亚做贡献吗？My visa did expire but I thought I could stay on. You said Iviolated the visa conditions by working here. That’s even moreridiculous. Wasn’t I contributing to Australia?
E2Please be aware that, you were issued with a six-month visa only,and overstaying that period and working are considered to be breakingthe law.
M2我从来没意识的这是违法的。我本来是打算来旅游的，但来这儿以后我就爱上这个地方了。I didn’t know that that was illegal. I intended to do somesightseeing around here but when I got here, I fell in love with thisplace.
E3Thousands of people come to Australia every year, but there is aquota for migration and there is also a waiting list. You have to meetcertain requirements and go through a series of procedures to migratehere.
M3我并不知道，因为当时我的旅游签证是一个中介帮我递交的。当我来这以后，我遇到很多其他的游客也在打工，所以我觉得我也可以这样做。I didn’t know that because my tourist visa application was lodgedthrough an agent. After I got here I met plenty of other tourists whowere working, so I believed I could do the same.
E4What others do does not make what you did legal. The tourists youtalked about might hold a working holiday visa, which gives them theright to work.
M4有人愿意雇我说明我有足够的技能在澳大利亚工作生活，我可以通过技术移民的方式继续留在澳洲吗？The fact that somebody would like to hire me shows that I haveenough skills to work and live in Australia. Can I continue to stay herethrough skilled migration?
E5You came to Australia on a visitor’s visa and have since broken thelaw so you haven’t made a very good start if you want to apply foranother visa.
M5我并不是故意违反法律的。我不是那种人。我之前在国内从来没遇到过这种麻烦。I didn’t mean to break the law. I’m not that kind of person. I’venever broken the law in my own country.
E6At this stage there is little I can do for you. You are permitted tomake an application for permanent residency but you will have to lodgethe application from outside the country. I can tell you now that byoverstaying your current visa you have harmed your chances.
M6我听说过有人会通过各种手段留在这里，比如跟不认识的人结婚，宣称回国的话会被杀掉，甚至使用假身份。我从来没做过那些事。你真没有别的办法帮我了吗？I’ve heard about people trying all sorts of things to stay here,like marrying someone they hardly know, claiming they’ll be killed ifthey go back home, or even taking on a false identity. I haven’t doneanything like that. Is there nothing you can do to help me?

entry.title: 初始咨询
entry.content:
The following dialogue is between Mrs. Lu, a new migrant, and Henry,a community service officer. Mrs. Lu is seeking advice regardingsettling in Australia. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning Mrs. Lu. What can I do for you today?
M1你好，女士。我这个月初刚移民到澳大利亚。我儿子告诉我你可以就如何适应这儿的新生活给我一些建议。所以我跟你约了这次会面。Hello, I just migrated to Australia early this month. My son told meyou can give me some tips on how to adapt to my new life here. That’swhy I made this appointment with you.
E2Right. Everyone who’s new to this country needs to go through theprocess of becoming established and independent in Australia. We cangive you some advice to get through this process smoothly.
M2我想我最大的问题是英语。我一点儿也不会说，而且我觉得像我这么老的人学习英语也很困难了。I think my biggest problem is English. I don’t speak English at alland I think it will be very difficult to learn English as I’m alreadythis old.
E3There is a national translation and interpreting service fornon-English speakers. You are also eligible for our free Adult MigrantEnglish Program (AMEP) since you’re holding a permanent residentvisa.
M3听起来不错。但我如何参加课程呢？课程有多长呢？我需要大老远的来市中心上课吗？It’s good to know that but how can I join the program? Also, howlong will the course last? Will I have to go all the way to the city toattend classes?
E4Well you can find your nearest course provider in this booklet. Youcan study English with the AMEP for up to 510 hours or until you reachfunctional English, whichever comes first.
M4其他我还需要做什么吗？我听说我需要申请一个税号。如果我不工作的话也需要税号吗？What else do I need to do? I heard that I need to apply for a TaxFile Number. Do I have to have this number if I don’t work?
E5Anyone who receives any type of income, including a Centrelinkpayment needs a Tax File Number. You can visit the website of theAustralian Taxation Office to do that.
M5你之前提到了Centrelink。那是什么？类似于中国的社保局吗？You mentioned Centrelink before. What is it? Is it similar to theSocial Security Bureau in China?
E6Kind of, I guess. Centrelink is a government agency which delivers arange of services to the community. You need to register with them butas a newly arrived migrant, you are not immediately eligible for socialsecurity.
M6我了解了。感谢你抽时间来见我。澳大利亚公务员确实更知道如何为人民服务啊。I understand. Thanks for your time. It’s true that Australian publicservants know how to serve the people better.

entry.title: 商业移民
entry.content:
The following dialogue is between Mr. Guan and Adam, a migrationagent. Mr. Guan is enquiring about applying for a business visa for hisbrother. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1我想把我的弟弟带出来到澳大利亚来生活。他现在住在中国。Hello! I’d like to bring my younger brother to Australiapermanently. He lives in China now.
M1How long have you been living in Australia? How long have you been apermanent resident of Australia? Or are you an Australian citizen?
E2我 8年前持学生签证来到澳大利亚。在我得到学位之后，我申请独立技术移民。很幸运的,我在 2003 年得到了永居签证。I came to Australia eight years ago on a student visa. I applied forpermanent residency after I finished my degree. Fortunately, I receivedpermanent residency in 2003.
M2Okay I see. Are you considering sponsoring your brother under thefamily reunion scheme? If you want to sponsor your brother under thiscategory, you need to pass the family balance test.
E3不用。实际上呢他在寻求作为商业移民的移民可能。我已经给了他一些有关的信息，他非常有兴趣来到澳洲并在这里建立生意。No. Actually he is looking at the possibility of migrating here on abusiness visa. I have given him some relevant information and he isvery
M3That’s good. Australia needs business people with capital andexpertise in overseas markets. Is your brother already running abusiness in China or is he looking at investing in a business here?interested in starting a business in Australia.
E4他有他自己的计算机软件生意在北京。他的公司开发反病毒软件。我想他是想把他的生意扩展到澳大利亚来。
M4Well that sounds viable. The software area is still growing andthere are so many computer bugs around. Australia needs well-trained ITpeople so he’ll be able to make full use of his talent.He is running his own computer software business in Beijing. It’s acompany developing anti-virus software. I think he is looking forward tomoving his business to Australia.
E5对于他的申请他需要准备什么样的文件呢？我要怎样做才能够加速他的申请？
M5The guidelines in this How to Migrate to Australia booklet mighthelp. It details all the documents your brother needs to prepare.There’s a special chapter on business migration.What documents does he need to prepare for the application? What canI do to speed up the process of his application?
E6好的，谢谢。申请费是多少呢？在递交申请以前，需要去体检吗？
M6The application fee for the business migration program is $3,800.We’ll advise him if he needs to have a health check after we’reconvinced that his business plan is a viable one.All right, thank you. How much is the application fee? Does he needto have a medical check before lodging the application?

entry.title: 父母移民
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Mr. Liu (L), who wants his parents tomigrate to Australia, and a migration agent Henry (H). * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning Mr. Liu, how can I help you today?10
M1早上好。我想申请签证让我父母移民来澳大利亚，这样我就好照顾他们了。所以我来见你。Good morning. I’d like to apply for a visa so my parents can migratetoAustralia and I can look after them. That’s why I’m here.
E2Sure. First of all, could you tell me your residential status? Thatis, are you an Australian resident and if so, when were you granted yourpermanent residency?
M2是的，我是持庇护签证的永久居民。我 2005 年 3 月来澳寻求庇护, 在 2006年 1 月获得了永久签证。Yes I am a permanent resident on a protection visa. I came toAustralia and sought protection in March, 2005 and I got permanentresident status in January, 2006.
E3In this case, I think you are a qualified sponsor. How many childrenorstep-children do your parents have and where do they reside now?
M3只有我和我哥哥。但他两个月前因癌症在中国去世。在中国没什么比晚年丧子更悲剧的了，所以我想把他们接到澳大利亚来照顾。Just me and my older brother who died of cancer in China two monthsago. You know, in China nothing is more tragic than losing your childwhen you’re old. That’s why I want to take care of my parents inAustralia.
E4I’m sorry to hear that. Now, I think you meet the basic requirementsfor sponsoring your parents to come to Australia since you have been apermanent resident for over two years and you are the only remainingchild of your parents.
M4我听说有两种选择，一种是一般父母移民签证，另一种是付费父母移民签证，你能解释一下这两者的区别吗？I heard that there are two options, which are a parent migrant visaand a contributory parent migrant visa. Could you explain the differencebetween them?
E5For the contributory parent migrant visa, applicants have to pay amuch larger visa application fee and an Assurance of Support bond.Applicants or their sponsor contribute to Government revenue and help tooffset some costs but the waiting period is much shorter than for theparent migrant visa.
M5我可能选择付费父母移民，因为我想尽早把他们借来。他们同样需要满足健康状况要求，是吗？I may choose the contributory one because I want to have them hereas soon as possible. They also need to meet health requirements,right?
E6That’s correct. You can find what the requirements are in thisbrochure. You also need to provide an Assurance of Support before theirvisa application can be granted.
M6好的，感谢你的指点。我马上就去准备签证申请。OK, thanks for this information. I will go and prepare everythingfor this visa application.

entry.title: 开附属卡
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Mr Chen (C), a Mandarin speaking customer,and John (J), a credit card specialist from the Commonwealth Bank. MrChen is enquiring about his credit card over the phone. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Thank you for calling the Commonwealth Bank Card Centre, my name isJohn. How can I help you today?Hello John. I’m calling because I’d like to know whether I can applyfor an additional card for my younger brother. I’d also like to know ifthere are any charges.
M1你好,John。我打电话来是想问一下我是不是可以为我弟弟申请一张附属信用卡。我还想知道是否会产生费用？
E2Definitely, there may be a cost involved depending on the type ofcredit card that you are holding. Now, may I have your name, date ofbirth and customer reference number please?32
M2我叫 Tim Chen。我的生日是 1980 年 11 月 26日。客戶號碼呀，你等等…我的客户号码是 5353 8092。My name is Tim Chan. My date of birth is 26 November 1980. Mycustomer reference number? Just a second…my customer reference number is5353 8092.
E3Thank you Mr. Chen. Our records show that you have a ‘low-fee’credit card which allows you to add one additional card holder withoutany extra charges.27
M3那真是太好了。我弟弟下個星期會来澳洲读书。我想给他一张附属卡，以备不时之需。那你能否帮到我呢？That’s great! My younger brother is coming to study in Australianext week. I want to give him a card in case he needs it. Will you beable to help me with this now?
E4Sorry Mr. Chen, I’m not authorised to do it over the phone forsecurity reasons. We need to check your ID documents at a branch beforewe can process this.30
M4好，我明白了。那就等他来了之后，我再带他到你们在这附近的分行去申请吧。我还想问问这卡的限额是怎么分配的。OK, I understand. After he has arrived, I’ll take him to the branchnear our place to apply for the card. I’d also like to know how the cardlimit is split.
E5The card limit will be shared between the two cardholders. Thatmeans the total amount spent by both of you must not exceed the cardlimit, say $7000 in your case.33
M5多谢你回答我全部的疑问。但听起来似乎很麻烦啊。有没有什么我要注意的地方呢？Thank you very much for answering all my questions. But it soundsvery troublesome. Is there anything else that I need to be awareof?
E6He’ll get a card in his own name but with your account number. Thatmeans he can do most of the things you can do as the primary cardholder,such as setting up regular payments.35
M6我需要考虑一下。不管怎么说，非常感谢你。I’ll need to think about it. Anyway, thank you very much!

entry.title: 彩票理财
entry.content:
A Mandarin speaking client is asking a financial advisor about how toinvest his money. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good afternoon, Mr. Su. Please come in. I am the bank manager here.Now, what can I do for you?20
M1我从来都没有想过我会向别人请教如何花钱，但我最近看了很多文章，发现专业的理财还是很有必要的。所以我来找你。I never thought that I would ask people about how to spend money.But I’ve read a lot of articles recently and found professional moneymanagement is quite necessary. That’s why I’m here.
E2Sure I will try my best to assist you. By the way, I can tell thatyou are a business-minded person, am I right? First, can you tell me howmuch money you have to invest?36
M2其实我没做过生意，但是我上周很幸运的中了彩票，得到了 6万多块钱。我想那其中的 5 万来投资。Actually, I’ve never had my own business. But luckily, I won thelottery last week and got a little over $60,000. So I want to take$50,000 of it to invest.
E3There are a number of investment options you could consider,including investing in shares, although this is not a good idea atpresent. Other options could be a savings investment account or buyingvarious bonds.35
M3确实，最近的全球金融危机和欧洲的债务危机基本已经打消了我投资股票的念头。你能跟我说说其他的一些选项吗？Indeed, I have given up on the idea of investing in shares due tothe recent global financial crisis and European debt crisis. Can youtell me other options?
E4Certainly. Government bonds are an outstanding investment forcautious investors, at least in this country. They are a good way tosave for your retirement, children’s education, an overseas holiday andmany other things.34
M4那储蓄投资帐户是什么呢？这里的柜员常常向我推荐，但我总是谢绝了。So what is the savings investment account? The tellers here haverecommended it to me many times, but I always respectfully declinedtheir offer.
E5A savings investment account is ideal for those people who stillneed to withdraw on the amount they’ve invested. All you need is todeposit $200. The interest is calculated on a daily basis.34
M5如果我需要取钱，我需要等待多久呢？你们这里的定期存款项目是怎样的呢？If I need to make a withdrawal, how long do I need to wait before Ican get the money? How about the term deposit scheme here?
E6You can make a withdrawal at any time. A term deposit is ideal ifyou have money to invest and are prepared to commit it for a certainperiod in order to earn higher interest.33
M6非常感谢你的详细解释。不过我觉得我还需要更多时间来考虑，然后才能决定。我过两天再来见你，好吗？Thank you for your detailed explanation. However I still need sometime to think it over before making a decision. I will come to see youagain within a couple of days. Is that ok?

entry.title: 理财咨询
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between a financial adviser and a Mandarinspeaking client, Mr. Yang. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Thank you for coming today Mr. Yang. We have vast experience infinancial matters and we can help you accumulate wealth.21
M1谢谢你。我的朋友向我推荐过你，而且你的履历也让我印象深刻。似乎你总是能赚钱，从不赔钱。Thank you. My friend recommended you to me, and your track record isquite impressive. It seems that you always make a profit and never makea loss.
E2You have gone so far as to say we always win and never lose. That isnot true, unless it is in very general terms. Nobody out there is ableto win all the time.35
M2如果你不是过于谦虚的话，那我可不放心我把我钱交给你管。也许我来得不是地方，因为我就是要找只赚不赔的人。If it’s not that you are just being too modest, I don’t think I cantrust you and let you manage my money. Maybe I didn’t come to the rightplace. I’m looking for someone who always wins and never loses.
E3I’m just being honest with you, Mr. Yang. Would my promise make me abetter financial adviser? People who claim they never lose are bound tobe lying and they’ll get you into trouble.34
M3好吧。那么你就是承认你不总是赚钱咯？如果我把钱给你，你全赔光了可怎么办？这可是我毕生的积蓄，是我们家美好未来的保障！Right. So you admit that you do not always win? What if I give youmy money and you lose it all? They are my entire life savings, and theguarantee of a good future for my family.
E4It’s not as simple as that. When you start to invest, you shouldnever put all your eggs in one basket. That is what diversificationmeans.26
M4之前我有听过这个概念，但我不是很理解。它是不是说不要把你的钱全放在一家银行里？I’ve heard this concept before but I don’t quite understand. Does itmean that we should not put all our money in one bank?
E5Not exactly, but close enough. It means that your money should beinvested in many different income-producing schemes, such as shares,property trusts and bank accounts.27
M5我明白了。也就是说，要是一项投资赔钱了，整体的投资组合未必赔钱。其他的投资项目可能能抵消这一项的损失。I see. That is to say, even if one investment makes a loss, theentire investment portfolio may not make a loss. The gain from otherinvestments may offset the loss of one investment.
E6You’ve got it. You catch on very quickly and that’s good when youare about to invest. Let’s say it’s almost impossible for allinvestments to be losing simultaneously unless some extreme events occurlike war.36
M6好吧，我觉得你还是值得信任的。希望我能跟你合作！Alright, I think you are trustworthy. I hope you’ll be able to helpme.

entry.title: 房屋保险
entry.content:
Mr. Wang approaches a customer service officer of an insurancecompany to ask about the home insurance they provide. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1你好，我最近新买了一间三房两卫的房子，想上个保险。正好最近在电视上看到你们的广告，所有就过来了。Hello, I bought a house with three bedrooms and two bathroomsrecently and I want to have it insured. I just saw your ads on TV, soI’m here.
M1You’ve come to the right place as our company provides acomprehensive property policy. We recommend you consider insuring boththe building and its contents.26
E2我知道很多公司都提供这种类型的住房保险的，我要货比三家再决定。那你们这种综合险可以保哪些东西呢？I know there are many companies providing this kind of homeinsurance. I need to compare before deciding which one to go for. Sowhat does your comprehensive policy cover?
M2It will cover your home against any of these events: fire, lightningstrikes, earthquakes, theft, impact by any vehicle or falling trees,etc. You can get more details on our website or you can take a brochurehome.39
E3我拿一本小册子回去慢慢看。另外，如果我房子里的家具或电器损坏了，且无法维修，那怎么办？如果，连房子都完全损毁呢？I’ll take a brochure and read it carefully. Also, what if thefurniture and appliances in my house are so damaged that they cannot berepaired? What if my house is completely destroyed?
M3You must provide all the invoices of your damaged appliances. Thepolicy will enable you to build a new home of an equivalent style,material and size. Also, should you decide to purchase your propertyinsurance policy with us we can offer a lot of other benefits.48
E4对了，你能跟我说说其他的可报销项目吗？比如，如果我的房屋受损需要维修，这段期间你们会提供临时的住所吗？Oh also, can you tell me more about the other benefits? For example,if my house is damaged and needs repair, will you provide me withtemporary accommodation?
M4Yes, we can help you with the cost of temporary accommodation for upto 12 months. Other benefits include any debris removal costs,architects’ and surveyors’ fees and accidental breakage of fixed glassand mirrors.35
E5那还真不错。难怪，我有一个朋友向我推荐你们公司。你们的套餐确实很吸引人。有一件事我还不清楚，应该如何如何查询我的保险额呢？That’s pretty good. No wonder a friend of mine recommended yourcompany to me. Your policy is really appealing. One more thing, how canI find out the amount insured?
M5You need to measure the house and get the total area. Then multiplythe number of square metres by the approximate building costs listed inthe table provided.28
E6假如我还不是知道如何计算，你们有同事可以帮我吗？还有，我可以选择垫底费是多少吗？If I still don’t know how to calculate it, will your colleagues helpme with that? Also, can I choose how much the excess is?
M6Yes, we can arrange to have one of our agents make the calculationfor you. The excess will vary according to the sum insured. For example,if you are insured for $100,000 the excess is $200.36

entry.title: 三方财险
entry.content:
Mr. Huang is calling AAMI to make a claim. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning, you’ve called AAMI. My name is Harry. How can I helpyou?14
M1你好，我叫黄晓明。我买了你们的第三方财险。今天早上发生了起事故，我想索赔。Hello, my name is Huang Xiaoming. I purchased your Third PartyProperty Damage insurance policy. I had an accident this morning, so Iwant to make a claim.
E2OK，Mr. Huang, could you please tell me your date of birth so I canverify your identity? Also, could you please tell me the referencenumber of your policy?31
M2我的生日是 1983 年 7 月 14 日。请稍等一下，我找一下保单号…有了，是TPPD21853.My birthday is the 14th of July, 1983. Please hold on, let me findmy policy number. Got it, it’s TPPD21853.
E3Yes you are holding our Third Party Property Damage Insurance. Now,Mr. Huang, could you please tell me what happened this morning?22
M3我住在一个带地下车库的公寓里。今天早上我开车出门时，一不小心蹭到了对面车库的门，撞凹进去了一块。live in an apartment with an underground garage. When I drove outthis morning, I accidentally scraped my car against the gate of anothergarage right in front, leaving a dent on it.
E4Your policy covers you for damage caused by your car to propertyowned by a third party in the event of an accident. In this case, we canpay for the cost of repairing the gate. However, the cost of repair foryour car is not covered.46
M4我知道。不过我车也没受什么损伤，就车头有一点划痕。那我是不是要付垫底I know that. But there is little damage to my car, just a bit of ascratch on the front. Do I have to pay the excess?
E5Yes, you need to pay the excess of $550. If you have a credit cardon hand, we can process the payment right now. Alternatively, you canring us later to update your payment information.
M5我现在就付吧。可是，如果修理车库门所花的实际费用低于这550块垫底费怎么办？I’ll pay it now. But, what if the actual cost of repair is lowerthan $550?
E6If that’s the case, I can simply cancel your claim and notify you.Then you can pay the owner of the garage directly. However, according tomy experience, that kind of repair normally costs more than $550.
M6我了解了。我公寓大楼管理员的电话是 0439 872109，你可以和他联系来确定维修的费用。I see. The number of the building manager for this apartment blockis 0439 872 109. You can contact him to confirm the cost.

entry.title: 旅游保险
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between an insurance advisor, Mr Nelson, and MissLu, about taking out an insurance policy for her parents. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Hello, Miss Lu. Nice to meet you. How can I help you today?13
M1是这样的，我父母下个月要来澳洲看我，顺便到处玩玩，你们公司有什么针对海外游客的保险吗？Well, my parents are coming to Australia next month to visit me andtravel around as well. Do you provide any insurance policies foroverseas visitors?
E2We have three types of visitor cover: basic, mid-range, and topcover. The premium for each type varies depending on the coverage. Howlong are your parents going to stay here?31
M2两个月，他们想等国内天气凉了之后再回国。保险的价格是多少？我想选个实惠又比较全面的保险。Two months. They don’t want to go back until the weather in Chinacools down. How much is the insurance cover? I’d like to choose aninexpensive yet fairly comprehensive plan.
E3The monthly price for these plans ranges from $190 to $520. If youare on a budget, basic cover may be sufficient.25
M3那基本保险的保险范围是什么？虽然我父母现在总的来说健康状况不错，但也可能需要时不时去看看医生。What’s the coverage of the basic cover? Even though my parents aregenerally healthy now, they may need to see a doctor from time totime.
E4That’s very wise. No one wants to worry about healthcare expenseswhen going on vacation. Well, the basic plan includes public hospitalin-patient services, and outpatient services such as GP or specialistvisits.33
M4听起来还不错。对了，我妈妈有牙疼的老毛病，她在澳期间可能需要去看牙医。牙科费用是否包括在基本保险中？It sounds good. Well, my mum has long had toothaches and she mayneed to go to the dentist while she’s in Australia. Are dental costscovered by the basic plan?
E5Yes. Expenses for dental surgery are covered. In fact, a lot ofother items are included as well, such as heart surgery, eye procedures,and emergency treatment required after an accident.31
M5我了解了。最后，我想知道一下如何付保险费。是不是需要我到你们的店面去付钱呢？I see. Lastly, I’d like to know how I can pay the premium. Do I needto go down to one of your branches to make the payment?
E6We offer a variety of payment options. You can pay online, over thetelephone, by mail or at one of our local branches. Here’s a bilingualbrochure that you can read.31
M6太好了，我现在就读一下，如果我还有什么问题，我会再请教你的。谢谢！Great. I’ll read it now. I’ll let you know if I have any morequestions. Thank you!

entry.title: 房屋扩建
entry.content:
A resident approaches an officer of the local council to ask aboutbuilding an extension to a house. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1我想询问关于对房子进行扩建的事情。我需不需要填一张申请表呢？我需要做什么才能得到批准呢？I’d like to enquire about house extensions. Do I need to fill out anapplication form? What should I do to get my application approved?
M1You’ve come to the right place. It really depends on where you are,the type of dwelling and the nature of the extension. What sort ofrenovations did you have in mind?
E2我想扩建房子后部的厨房和餐厅。所以我们想从后墙再扩建 3米，那样就应该给我们足够大地方的厨房和一个吃饭的地方，甚至还有一间太阳房。I’d like to extend my kitchen and dining room at the rear of myhouse. We want a three-metre extension from the back wall, which willgive us enough room for the new kitchen and dining room, and even asunroom.
M2According to Section 77 of the Environmental Planning &Assessment Act 1979, you need to apply for a Construction Certificate.You also need to submit a building application. What street do you liveon?
E3我住在 Mason街。是那些全砖的加利福尼亚平房的一间。你能给我一些关于我应该怎么做的信息吗？你们有没有一个中文小册子呢？I live on Mason street. My house is one of the brick Californiabungalows. Can you give me some information about what I should do? Doyou have any brochures in Chinese?
M3Here’s the checklist for building applications. You’ll get a writtenacknowledgement in the post once your application has been received.That will contain a reference number for making further enquiries. Theapplication is then passed on to a town planner or building surveyor forassessment.45
E4我听说在澳大利亚我的邻居和住这个地区的人们是可以反对我的改建提议的。是这样的吗？这看起来有一点不公平吧。我的意思是，那完全取决于你跟邻居的关系怎么样。I was told that in Australia my neighbours and people living in thisarea can oppose my proposal. Is that so? It is not very fair. I mean, ittotally depends on your relationship with your neighbours.
M4Your neighbours are notified by mail and invited to inspect theproposal at the council over a 14-day period. If no objections arereceived and the proposal complies with council’s planning controls,approval will be granted.36
E5那如果有人反对呢？我是不是就扩建不成了？还是由政府来仲裁？What if there are objections? Does it mean that I can’t extend myhouse? Or will the government arbitrate?
M5The council will examine the reasons for the objection and thendecide whether you can make the extension.18
E6这听起来对我来说都很复杂。我希望没有人反对。不管怎么说呢我需要知道费用的问题。申请费多少钱呢？并且我的改建提议要具体到什么程度呢？It all sounds complicated to me. I hope there are no objections.Anyway I need to know how much the fees are. How much is the applicationfee? And how detailed does my proposal need to be?
M6The fee is based on the estimated cost of the building works, so youshould get a rough quote from a builder. Building plans must include asite plan, floor plans, elevations and section plans as well as adrainage plan.41

entry.title: 租房报修
entry.content:
A tenant has just moved into a house and rings the agent managing thehouse to report a number of repairs that are required. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Hello, Smith Real Estate. This is Chris speaking, how can I helpyou?13
M1你好。我的名字是 Jason. 我想我上周见过你。我刚刚搬进你们名下在Kensington St 的房子。我想报告一些问题。Hello. My name is Jason. I think we met last week. I just moved intoyour property in Kensington St. I’d like to report some problems.
E2Yes Jason, I remember you. You are at number 73, aren’t you? Hang onand I’ll just get the file. Okay, I’ve got it here. Now what are theproblems you’ve noticed?32
M2这里有很多东西需要维修。但我最关心的是厨房里有一股让人感到昏晕的瓦斯气味。我很担心这可能是漏气了。Many things here need repairing. But I’m most concerned about thegas smell in the kitchen, which is making me dizzy. I’m worried it is agas leak.
E3Yes. You are quite right. That’s something that needs to be checkedstraight away. Will you be home all day today? I’ll ring the gas companystraight away to check your stove but they usually don’t specify whattime they’ll come.41
M3我本来打算外出购物。但既然如此，我就在家等着吧。不过，这听起来可不是很合理。I was going to go shopping. But if that’s the case, I’ll wait athome. However, it doesn’t sound very reasonable.
E4I agree with you but if there’s a gas leak they usually come prettyquickly. They’ll probably be there within an hour. Now, you mentionedthat there’s something else you’d like to report.33
M4是的。首先烤箱上其中的一个按钮坏掉了。所以我用不了烤箱。同样，一些门把手松了，还有在窗轨和滑道处，充满了污垢。Yes. First, a button on the oven is broken, so I can’t use it. Also,some of the door knobs are loose and there is dirt all through the trackof the sliding window.
E5I’ll send a contractor to fix it as soon as possible, probablywithin a day or two. Loose door handles are considered minor problems,minor repairs and such are the tenants own responsibility. The sameapplies to cleaning the sliding window tracks.44
M5我不认为这是公平的。在上一个房客搬走之后，新房客搬进来之前，你们需要适当的清洁房子。I don’t think that’s fair. You should clean the place properly afterthe last tenant moves out and before the new tenant moves in.
E6I’m sorry you feel that way but that’s the way we normally dothings. I will contact the gas company now as that matter is urgent.Thank you for calling.
M6那好吧，我要是发现了其他问题再来找你。Fine. I’ll call you if there is anything else.

entry.title: 悉尼买房
entry.content:
Mr. Li, a business migrant, is having a conversation with a realestate agent. Mr. Li is looking for a house to purchase. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1下午好。我和我的家庭刚到悉尼，现在住在 Vibe酒店。我们想尽快买房子。你能帮助我们吗？Good afternoon. My family and I just arrived in Sydney and we arestaying at Vibe Hotel. We’d like to buy a home as soon as possible. Canyou help us?
M1Good afternoon Mr. Li. Of course, I’d be delighted to help you. Nowtell me, what type of place are you looking for?23
E2我想买个大一点的房子，要有 4个卧室，两个卫生间，有大花园，最好是有些树，孩子们可以在树荫下玩。We want a big house with four bedrooms, two bathrooms and a biggarden. It would be better to have some trees so that my children canplay in the shade.
M2There are a number of properties like that on the market so thereshouldn’t be any problem. Do you know which suburb you’d like to livein? Have you done some research on your own?35
E3我对悉尼不太熟悉。我想最好离市中心和大学比较近。因为我太太和我不想一天花几个小时上下班。朋友建议说住在Hurstville 或是住在 Burwood. 这附近你有适合的房源吗？I’m not familiar with Sydney. I’d prefer somewhere close to the CBDand university because my wife doesn’t want to spend hours commutingevery day. My friend recommended Hurstville and Burwood. Do you have anygood houses there?
M3Yes we do. They are both excellent areas with large Chinesecommunities. Burwood is slightly more expensive. What we really need todiscuss now is the price range you are considering.31
E4如果我投资预算在 75万澳币左右，能否买到我想要的那种房子呢？我想最好是不用去贷款。Can I get that kind of house, if my budget is around $750,000? I’dprefer not to take out a loan.
M4Factors such as location and block size all have a bearing on theprice. It’s quite possible in Hurstville but it may be difficult to findsomething suitable in Burwood around that price.33
E5我听说了，悉尼的房价飞涨，一天一个样。所以，你还是帮我们尽快找到一个合适的房子吧。对了，你可以带我们去看看房子吗？Ｉheard that the housing prices in Sydney are now soaring up and upevery day. So please help us find a suitable property as soon aspossible. Also, can you take us to inspect the houses?
M5Sure. You might be interested in a solar energy house in Hurstvillewhich has just come onto the market. I’d be happy to pick you up at yourhotel.Just let me know the best time for you.38
E6好的，那我们明天上午 10点间如何？你最好能准备一些正在出售的房子的书面情况介绍。Good. Shall we meet at 10am tomorrow? It would be great if you couldprepare some written details about the houses for sale.
M6Sure. Of course, you are under no obligation to buy and there are nofees or charges involved. We’ve also got arrangements with other agentsso we can show you houses they have on the market.36

entry.title: 理科天才
entry.content:
The following is a dialogue between a teacher and the mother of a19-year-old girl who is doing her Higher School Certificate. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good to see you again, Mrs. Tian. This time I have good news for youregarding your daughter’s results. She is doing extremely well.24
M1哦！我太高兴了。过去两年一直非常担心。对于她还有整个家庭，过去两年很困难。Oh, I’m so happy. I’d been very worried over the past two years. Ithas been a difficult time for her and the whole family.
E2Trust me, she is an excellent achiever. Her marks are in the top 40%and that really means something, considering her background.22
M2的确如此。她来到一个新的国家，说着不同的语言，还必须同时学习这里的语言和学校的功课，要是人们知道这有多困难就好了。ndeed. She came to a new country where people speak a differentlanguage, and she has had to study the language and the school subjectsat the same time. I wish people could understand how hard it is.
E3I know, it must have been extremely difficult for all of you butTracy is such a smart girl! Plus, she has been working very hard. Allher teachers are so impressed by her incredible success.
M3他对于数学和物理非常感兴趣，所以她这两门的成绩非常好。她因此还选了另外四门工科的课。哦，我真希望能够有个好成绩，因为她特别想学工程。She is very interested in maths and physics, so she has got verygood results in them. And that’s why she also chose four other sciencesubjects. Oh, I hope she can do well because she is so eager to studyengineering.
E4Well, we’ll have to wait until she sits her exams before we canconsider what she can do. I’m confident she’ll get into university, ifnot at her preferred institution, but at least in her preferred subjectarea.
M4你为什么能这么肯定？你说过她在模拟考试中考得很好，能够考上大学，不过我觉得她跟当地孩子比起来，没有那么聪明。Why are you so sure? You said she did great in the mock exam and wasable to make her way to university. But as I understand it, she is notthat smart, compared to local kids.
E5I think what you are saying is not quite right because based on hercurrent performance, she could easily be admitted for an arts degree. Iunderstand that may not be what she wants currently, but if it is theonly choice, she’ll have to take it, I’m afraid.
M5但如果她学习不喜欢的东西，她是不会学好的。如果不是她感兴趣的专业，她是不会接受的。而且因为她语言背景的问题，文科比理科更难学。If she studied something she doesn’t like, she wouldn’t do well atit. She wouldn’t take a major, if she wasn’t interested in it. Plusbecause of her language background, arts are more difficult thanscience.
E6Yes, that’s the irony of it. We all know that she can do a lotbetter in a science course rather than an arts one, and yet beingadmitted to a science course requires higher grades.
M6我知道你已经帮了 Tracy很多了，但请你再尽力帮帮她。如果她没有考到一个好成绩，并没能在大学学到理科，她的未来就完了！I know you have helped Tracy a lot. But please try to help her more!If she doesn’t get a good score and fails to get into science atuniversity, she won’t have a future.

entry.title: 体育项目
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Mr Wang (W), a parent and Mr Hargraves(H), the sports coordinator of Burwood High School. Mr Wang recentlyreceived a letter from the school and would like to ask some questionsabout the sports programs at the school. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Hello, I am Mr. Hargraves, one of the teachers here. How can I helpyou?15
M1你好。我想问一下负责体育活动的Tyler老師在不在啊？我跟他约了今天十点钟的见面。Hi, I would like to know whether Mr Tyler, who is responsible forsports, is here or not. I have made an appointment to see him at 10today.
E2Oh, Mr. Tyler … He’s currently on long service leave so I havereplaced him as the sports coordinator. Don’t worry! I’ll be able tohelp you. What’s the matter?30
M2我是 8 年纪B 班 Jenny的爸爸，我姓王。我上星期三收到學校寄来的一封信，通知我说我女儿对于星期三的運動項目选择有問題。到底是什么問題呢？I’m the father of Jenny from Year 8B. My family name is Wong. LastWednesday, I received a letter from the school which informed me thatthere’s something wrong with my daughter’s Wednesday sports choices.What’s the problem?
E3Just wait a second … I need to get her record from the computersystem. Our records show that she hasn’t picked a sport to do and thatseems to be the problem.33
M3是呀。我觉得有点贵，所以我没有让她參加。比如说游泳吧，半年就要200块。我怕我负担不起。Yes. I think it’s a bit expensive, that’s why I didn’t allow her tojoin. Take swimming as an example, it costs $200 for half a year. I’mafraid that we can’t afford it.
E4I see. But look Mr. Wong, Jenny has to enrol in one of the sportsprograms. It’s the policy of the Department of Education that schoolshave to offer sports, including free sports, for students to participatein.38
M4我真不知道學校原來有免費的運動項目呀，可能我填申請表的时候没有看到吧，那么哪些项目是免費的呢？I really didn’t know the school offers free sports. Maybe Ioverlooked them when I was filling out the application form. So, whatsports are free?
E5There are lots of them. For example, volleyball, badminton, tabletennis and multi-sports in which students will do a different sport eachweek for 20 weeks.
M5这個「多種運動」听起来不错，我想让她学习不同的运动和各自相关的规则。不知道还有没有位置呢？如果没有了，她可以去打羽毛球吗？“Multi-sports” sounds great! I want her to learn different sportsand their rules. Are there any positions left? If not, can she joinbadminton?
E6Yes. Jenny can definitely join multi-sports and I’ll put her namedown in a minute. Please remind her to bring a bottle of water and atowel with her every Wednesday!
M6好。我明白。真是非常感谢。OK. I understand. Thank you very much.

entry.title: 教育系统
entry.content:
A Chinese education official is asking an Australian counterpartabout the education system in Australia. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1感谢您能抽空回答我关于澳大利亚教育系统的问题。首先我想问的是在澳大利亚，教育是联邦政府的责任还是州级政府的责任？Thank you for taking time to answer my questions regarding theAustralian education system. My first question is, in Australia is itthe Federal Government or the State Government that is responsible foreducation?
M1Each state government manages the school system within their state.This means that they provide funds for and regulate their schools. Also,each state has a Vocational Education and Training (VET) or Technicaland Further Education (TAFE) system. However, funding for universitiesis the federal government’s responsibility.47
E2中国的教育系统有三级，即初级教育，中等教育以及高等教育，请问澳大利亚也是采用类似的模式吗？China has a three-tier education system which includes primaryeducation, secondary education and tertiary education. Do you follow asimilar model?
M2Yes, Australia follows a similar three-tier model and schooleducation, including primary education and secondary education are bothcompulsory.19
E3哦，这跟中国不一样。我们实行的是九年制义务教育，即小学和初中是强制的。那你们中小学的课程大纲是由州教育部编写吗？Oh, that is different from us. China has implemented a nine-yearcompulsory education, which means primary school and junior secondaryschool are compulsory. Is the state education department in charge ofpreparing curriculum for schools?
M3No. Each state has its own Board of Studies which sets the corecurriculum by developing syllabuses for Kindergarten to Year 12 andprovides support materials for teachers and parents. It also manages theSchool Certificate external tests and the Higher School Certificateexaminations each year.46
E4说到HSC，它是不是指大学的入学考试，就如同中国的高考呢？在学生课业方面，有怎样特别的安排呢？Speaking of the HSC, is it a university entrance examination? Justlike China’s Gao Kao? And are there any special arrangements in terms ofthe courses for students?
M4The Higher School Certificate (HSC) is the highest award insecondary education in New South Wales. To be eligible for the award,students must complete Years 11 and 12, satisfy HSC course requirementsand sit for the state wide HSC examinations.41
E5那学生能进什么样的大学，读什么样的专业，是不是由 HSC考试的成绩决定的呢？So the result of the HSC determines which university a studententers and what major he or she can study, right?
M5Not exactly. The HSC Mark is a 50:50 combination of a student’s HSCexamination and school-based assessment mark for each course. Then theyhave to use this final mark to work out what their ATAR is beforeapplying for undergraduate university programs. Notes: AustralianTertiary Admission Rank (ATAR)42
E6那您可以说说澳洲的高等职业教育吗？我听说职业教育在这里非常受欢迎，而且蓝领工人的薪水往往比白领们要高。Can you talk about Australia’s tertiary education? I heardvocational education is very popular here and blue-collar workers oftenearn more than white-collar workers.
M6In Australia, most vocational tertiary education courses areprovided by TAFE. Studying in TAFE has many advantages including a focuson applied rather than abstract skills, practical teaching strategiesand seamless pathways between TAFE qualifications.35

entry.title: 女儿选课
entry.content:
Mr Lee (L) is talking to a school teacher (T) regarding hisdaughter’s subject choices. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning, Mr. Lee. You said you want to talk to me about yourdaughter, Cindy. What’s the problem?19
M1早上好,Tomas 老师。Cindy 明年就升入 11年级了，但是我对这边的高考制度不是很了解，所以想跟你谈一谈，听取些建议。Good morning, Mr. Tomas. Cindy’s starting Year 11 next year but I’mnot very familiar with the “Higher School Certificate” examinationsystem here. That’s why I want to talk to you about this and get someadvice.
E2I see. Cindy’s a very capable student and I’m sure she’ll do well inYears 11 and 12. I’d like to know whether you know anything about theHSC system before I start explaining it.35
M2我不是在这里受的教育，但我听我朋友说，12年级的学生要参加一个州级范围的考试。而这个考试的结果会决定他们去哪所大学就读。是这样吗？I wasn’t educated here but I was told by my friends that Year 12students need to sit a state-wide examination. The result of thatexamination determines which university they can go to. Am I right?
E3You’re quite right. But there are some more specific requirementsthat students need to follow in order to graduate. The basic rule isthat they need to complete at least 10 units of study in their HSC.37
M310 个单元学分的学习？是 10个科目的意思吗？这对她来说会不会太困难了？那她一周要去学校上课上多久呀？10 units of study? Does that mean 10 subjects? Will that be too hardfor her? How long does she need to go to school for each week?
E4Mr. Lee, I think you’ve misunderstood me. “10 units of study”doesn’t mean 10 subjects at all. In the HSC, each subject can havebetween 1 to 4 units and students can go beyond 10 units if they wantto.
M4我明白了。Cindy跟我说过，英文是必修科目，所以除了英文，她还想选读生物、化学、物理还有四个单元学分的数学。这样加起来够十个学分了吗？I see. Cindy told me that English is a compulsory subject and shewants to study biology, chemistry, physics and 4-unit mathematics apartfrom English. Do they make 10 units altogether?
E5That is 12 units in total. In this case, her final mark for HSC willbe calculated using her English result and the best marks for eight ofher other units.
M5不过呢，我想让她学语言，特别是中文。因为我们都是炎黄子孙，她能够讲中文不是会更好？请问HSC 里面有语言类考试吗？By the way, I want her to study languages especially Chinese. Thisis because she is Chinese and it’d be good for her to be able to speakthe language. Are there any language examinations in the HSC?
E6Definitely, there are more than 30 languages for students to choosefrom in the HSC; but our school only offers Chinese, Japanese, Korean,Italian, Latin and Spanish.
M6好的，我明白了。太谢谢你了！OK. I understand. Thank you very much!

entry.title: 女儿入学
外校参观
儿子入学
组织野营
受辱转队
土澳之旅
乐器检疫
预定航班
entry.content: This dialogue takes place between a travel agent at Asian ExplorerHolidays and a Mandarin speaking client, who wants to book a businesstrip to Hong Kong. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- |--- | | E1 | Good morning Mr. Wu. Thanks for dropping in. Please take aseat. | 12 | | M1 | 早上好，Jacob小姐。很高兴昨天给我打电话。我想不明白要提前这么长的时间来预订去香港的航班。| Good morning, Mr Jacob. I’m very glad you called yesterday. I don’tknow why I have to book a flight to Hong Kong so far in advance. | | E2| Hong Kong is always very popular with holiday-makers and January isthe peak season. When exactly would you like to travel and which classof seating would you like? | 29 | | M2 |我想订商务仓。我不喜欢太挤了。让我看看。会议是一月 11号开始，但我想有几天的时间来买东西，见一见朋友。一月 8号星期五有没有空位啊？ | I would like Business class. I like to havemore personal space. Let me see… The meeting starts on the 11th ofJanuary but I’d like to have a few days to shop and meet friends. Do youhave any seats available on Friday the 8th of January? | | E3 | That’sfine. There are a couple of flights with seats available on the 8th. Youcould fly direct, leaving at 10 in the morning or go via Melbourne,leaving here at 1 in the afternoon. | 35 | | M3 |我想我愿意直飞。我不喜欢在机场里等待。随便哪家航空公司都行，只要不是中国南方航空的就行，他们的服务太烂了。| I’d like to fly direct! I don’t like waiting at the airport. Anyairline is fine with me as long as it’s not China Southern. Theirservice is terrible! | | E4 | I’d recommend Cathay Pacific as it is aHong Kong owned airline. I will just key this into the computer. Now,Mr. Wu, can I please have your first name and the initials of any othernames, if you have them? | 41 | | M4 |国泰不错的，我以前坐过的。我的个人名字是 Ming。我没有其他的字首缩写。 |Cathay Pacific is pretty good. I have flown with them before. My firstname is Ming and I don’t have any other names. | | E5 | Ming Wu; CathayPacific, flight CX131 to Hong Kong departing Sydney, on the 8th ofJanuary 2012, at 9.15 am. That’s all in order. Now, how would you liketo pay? | 31 | | M5 |信用卡吧。对了，如果我要改变行程，我是跟你联系还是跟航空公司联系呢？需不需要收取费用呢？| By Credit card, please. By the way, if I need to change my itinerary,should I contact you or the airline? Are there any fees involved? | | E6| You can ring the airline directly to make changes to your itinerary.You need to tell them your Booking Reference: Number. They won’t chargeyou if there are seats available in business class. | 33 | | M6 |我明白了。多谢你的帮助。 | I see. Thanks for your help. |

entry.title: 赴华之旅
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between a Chinese trip organiser Mrs. Gao and Mr.Smith about organising a study tour to China. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning Mrs Gao, welcome to Melbourne. It’s good to see youagain.12
M1很高兴又见到了你史密斯先生。谢谢你去年组织一个学习参观团到中国与我们见面。我认为那十分的成功。It is very nice to see you again, Mr. Smith. Thank you fororganizing the study tour to visit us in China last year. I thought itwas very successful.
E2I thought so too. That’s why I’ve invited you here today. I’d liketo discuss with you the opportunity to organise another study tour toChina this year. I’m looking at maybe autumn this time.35
M2那太好了。秋天正是游览中国的最好季节之一。你认为会有多少人参与这个学习参观团？他们有一个什么样的背景？Fantastic! Autumn is one of the best seasons for traveling aroundChina. How many people do you expect will join the tour? Whatbackgrounds do they have?
E3There will be approximately 20 well-educated, professionals fromvarious backgrounds. They want to understand more about Chinese cultureand history. So I think they should definitely visit some of the keyplaces of cultural and historical significance.37
M320人应该比较好安排。我完全同意你。我认为他们应该参观北京，南京当然还有西安。这三个是中国非常有名的具有历史意义的地方。Twenty people should be easy to deal with. I totally agree with you.I believe they should visit Beijing, Nanjing and of course Xi’an. Theseare very famous cities with historical significance.
E4That sounds good. Some of them are also interested in spending sometime enjoying the natural scenery in the countryside. Is it possible toarrange something like that?28
M4是的，没问题。当他们参观这些城市的时候他们也有机会看到中国非常漂亮的风景。比如去西安时可以顺道游览一下雄壮险峻的华山。Yes, sure. They will have opportunities to appreciate somespectacular scenery when they visit these cities. For example, we can goand experience the magnificent Huashan Mountain on the way toXi’an.
E5Now, the group doesn’t wish to spend too much money onaccommodation. They would prefer to stay somewhere like the Holiday Inn,which they think would be adequate.28
M5没问题。我们会尽量帮他们预定当地的假日酒店，或者是标准相近的酒店。我们还能保证旅行团到的每一个地方有当地的导游作陪。No problem. We will try to book the Holiday Inn, or hotels of asimilar standard for them. We can also guarantee that wherever the groupgoes, they will have a local tour guide with them.
E6That’s excellent. A local guide will be able to answer any questionsthey have. We are looking forward to the trip already.22
M6我也期待他们能来到中国。我会尽快算出行程大约要花费多少钱，并且连同详细行程单一起发邮件给你。I also look forward to seeing them in China. I will work out anapproximate cost for the whole trip as soon as possible. Then I willemail it to you as well as a detailed itinerary.

entry.title: 虫草检疫
entry.content:
A Chinese tourist, Mr. Wang, is stopped by a customs officer at theairport. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Mr Wang, the interpreter is here so now we’ll be able to understandeach other.15
M1多谢你们的安排。我刚才在担心呢，害怕你们会因为我不会说英语，无法辩白而把我抓起来。Thanks for arranging this. I was worried that you would arrest mebecause I don’t speak English and cannot defend myself.
E2Now, can you tell me, what is your purpose for travel? I know youare on a visitor’s visa. Where will you be staying in Australia and howlong do you intend to stay?34
M2我的女儿女婿在悉尼工作，我这次来看望他们，准备在他们家住两个月。入境卡上的地址就是他们家的地址。My daughter and her husband work in Sydney. I came here to visitthem and I will stay at their place for two months. It’s their addressthat I have put on the incoming passenger card.
E3All right. We’ve stopped you at customs because we found this bag,with suspicious contents, in your luggage and we believe it containspests. Can you tell me what is in this bag?33
M3这是一包中草药，需要煎着喝的。我女儿的肠胃功能比较弱，中药能帮她调理调理。This is a bag of Chinese herbs, which need to be boiled in waterbefore taking. My daughter has poor digestion and Chinese medicine isable to help improve her condition.
E4But this is something you need to declare. Did your daughter ask youto bring this for her? Did you watch the Australian Quarantine videoabout what goods should be declared on the plane?34
M4不是我女儿要我带的，是我自己要带给她的。我不懂英语，所以视频里说了什么我也不知道。入境卡上除了个人信息，我也是看人家怎么填我就怎么填的。My daughter didn’t ask me to. It was my own idea to bring her these.I don’t speak English so I didn’t understand what the video said. As forthe information on the card, except the personal details, I just copiedwhat others wrote.
E5This dried plant material is very likely to harbour pests anddiseases. Oh, there is a bug crawling. I think it is a khapra beetle,which is the number one pest we want to keep out of Australia.38
M5我不知道里面怎么会有活的虫子的。那你们要拿它怎么样呢？你们要没收就没收吧，但我真的是无意触犯贵国的法律。I don’t know why there are living bugs in it. What are you going todo about it? You can confiscate it if you want, but I really didn’t meanto break the law.
E6We have to seize and destroy it because it is contaminated withpests. I’m going to give you a written warning and please be aware, nexttime when you travel, you must declare if you are bringing in somethinglike this.41
M6我知道了，我保证以后不会再犯同样的错误。I understand. I promise I won’t make the same mistake again.

entry.title: 临时入住
entry.content: This is a dialogue between Mr. Li, a Chinese-speaking guest, andHerbert, a hotel concierge. Mr Li has just arrived at the hotel andwants to check in. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- |--- | | E1 | Good Afternoon! My name is Herbert, how can I help you,sir? | 12 | | M1 | 不好意思， 我们没有提前做预订， 但是，我们想要一个带浴室的双人房，有漂亮的风景的。不知道你们有没有这样的空房？ | Sorry, we didn’tmake a booking in advance. But we’d like to have a double room with aprivate bathroom and a nice view. Do you have such a room available? | |E2 | Yes, we still have one double room with a harbour view available.It’s on the top floor with a bath and a shower. How many nights will yoube staying with us? | 32 | | M2 | 听起来很不错。我们今晚肯定是要住这里， 或许还有明天晚上， 这要看你们提供的价位怎样。还有，你们接受运通卡吗？ | Sounds good. We’llstay here definitely tonight and perhaps tomorrow night as well. Itdepends on the price you offer. One more thing, do you accept AmericanExpress? | | E3 | The room costs $200.00 per night for two people. Wecan provide an extra bed if it’s for three guests, but you need to payan additional $50.00 per night for that. And yes, we do accept AmericanExpress. | | | M3 | 就我跟我朋友两个人。 这个价位可以接受。那我们就定两晚吧。 给 你。 对了，今天下午我们想在这个城市周围逛逛，而且我们晚上想 吃海鲜。你推荐我们去哪里呢？ | It’s just the two of us,myself and my friend. The price sounds reasonable so we would like tostay two nights. By the way, we’d love to stroll around the city andhave some seafood for dinner. Do you have any recommendations? | | E4 |You can catch a free tram called the city circle near the main entranceof the hotel. It will take you to several sightseeing spots around thecity. Our hotel’s restaurant offers a fantastic seafood buffet dinner.It costs $60 per person, but you will receive a 20% discount as you arestaying as guests at the hotel. | | | M4 |我在旅行指南上看到过你们酒店的海鲜自助， 据说还挺受欢迎的，或许我们今天应该试试。 能否告诉我，从你们酒店这里到机场要多 长时间？ | Iknow your hotel’s seafood buffet is quite popular. I have read about itin a tourist guidebook. Maybe we should give it a try today. How longdoes it take to get to the airport from here? | | E5 | It usually takesonly half an hour but I suggest you allow an hour just to be on the safeside. May I have your card please, and would you please print your fullname and address on this form? | | | M5 | 给你。当然， 都写好了。所以后天我们会退房。 您可以帮我们在那天叫一辆九点钟的出租车吗？我们能不能有一个早上六点的叫醒服 务? | Hereyou are. Sure. All done. So we will check out the day after tomorrow.Can you help us book a taxi for 9am on that day? And can we have amorning call service at 6am as well? | | E6 | Certainly. Oh, one morething. We’ve had some issues in the past with the bath. It only takes 3minutes to fill so please watch it so it doesn’t overflow. You will haveto pay for any water damage if the carpet gets wet. | | | M6 |谢谢你的提醒，我会小心的。 | Thanks for warning us. We’ll be careful.|

entry.title: ISYS2047 Sample Exam
儿童津贴
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between a customer (C) and a Centrelink officerregarding the baby bonus. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning, please take a seat. How can I help you?11
M1是这样，我和我的老公正在考虑从中国领养一个婴儿。我听说有新生儿的父母可以领取儿童津贴。但是我不太了解如果我领养了孩子可不可以拿到，你能给我提供更多的关于这个的信息?Well, my husband and I are thinking of adopting a baby from China. Iheard that parents with a new born baby are eligible to get the BabyBonus, but I have no idea if I can get it for my adopted child. Can youplease give me more information about it?
E2Well, the Baby Bonus is a payment provided to parents who are havinga baby or adopting a child. We also provide related services to parentsin addition to the financial support which helps cover the many costsinvolved with raising a child.43
M2这就是说我领养的小孩也可以拿到补贴是吗? 你能在详细给我解释下我都应该怎么做来申领这个津贴吗？That means I am entitled to the Baby Bonus for my adopted child too,right? Can you explain in more detail what I should do to claim it?
E3OK. If you adopt a child from overseas you can add them to yourMedicare card from the date the child arrives in Australia. This isprovided the child is either on a permanent resident visa or a temporaryvisa with an application lodged for permanent residency.47
M3哦，我明白了。除了这个还有别的什么要求吗? 还有什么其他的我可以领取的津贴吗？Oh, I see. Apart from this, are there any other requirements we needto meet? Are there any other payments available for me?
E4An income test applies to the Baby Bonus. This is based on yourfamily’s income for the first six months after your child is born oradopted. If your family does not qualify for the Baby Bonus, you may beeligible for the Paid Parental Leave scheme.47
M4带薪育儿假计划? 听说过。领养小孩可以享受产假听起来不错。我从来没有过小孩，对于这些政策是一窍不通。Paid Parental Leave scheme? I’ve heard of that. It’s pretty goodthat parents who adopt a child are also eligible for parental leave. Ihave never had a child before, so I know nothing about thosepolicies.
E5I know. If you are eligible for both payments, you can only chooseone of them. This is based on which payment is the best decision foryour family financially. So I suggest you think about which payment toclaim before you send in the application.46
M5好的，我会好好计算一下每一笔津贴我能领取的金额。 还有一个问题， 如果我带孩子回中国住的话，我还可以拿到津贴吗。Sure, I will calculate carefully how much I can receive for eachpayment. One more question, what if I take my child to live in China?Can I still receive the payments?
E6Perhaps, but please be aware that payments can be paid for temporaryabsences of up to 13 weeks outside Australia, in most circumstances.However, you won’t get any payment beyond that period.32
M6我明白了。谢谢您的详细解释。如果有什么问题我会再过来咨询的。I see. Thank you for your detailed explanation. If I have anyquestions, I will come back to you.

entry.title: 戒烟专线
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Mr. Bennett, a health advisor fromI-Can-Quit NSW, and Mr. Lin, who is planning to quit smoking. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning, Mr Lin. I’m glad to see you here today. How can I helpyou?16
M1早上好，Bennett先生。我太太劝我戒烟，因为我们打算要宝宝了。所以，我今天过来寻求一些专业的建议。Good morning, Mr. Bennett. My wife is urging me to quit smoking aswe’re planning to have a baby. So I’m here today to get someprofessional advice.
E2That’s good to hear. There will be many benefits to you if you quit.Tell me about your smoking; how long have you smoked.”24
M2我今年 30 岁了。但我刚 20岁出头的时候，就开始吸烟了。一开始，我就是觉得吸烟是一件很酷的事，但没想到会上瘾。I’m 30, but I started smoking in my early twenties. In thebeginning, I was only doing it as I thought it was cool. But I didn’texpect that I would get addicted.
E3Well, that’s often the case for many young adults who smoke. Theyare tempted to try smoking for fun without thinking much about thesevere consequences, until one day they find it’s impossible tostop.35
M3对，就是这样。我现在呢，每天都至少要抽一整包的烟。我太太总抱怨说我就像个烟囱似的。Yes, exactly. Now I have to smoke at least one pack a day. My wifeoften complainsthat I smoke like a chimney.
E4If you are already aware of the health risks associated withsmoking, you should also understand that kicking this bad habit is notjust good for you but for those around you.32
M4是的，我懂。其实，我很早以前就想戒烟了。我甚至自己都尝试过几次，但所有的努力最终还是失败了。Yes. I do. Actually I’ve been wanting to stop for a long time. Ihave even tried a few times by myself, but all my efforts ended infailure.)Yes. I do. Actually I’ve been wanting to stop for a long time.I have even tried a few times by myself, but all my efforts ended infailure.)Yes. I do. Actually I’ve been wanting to stop for a long time.I have even tried a few times by myself, but all my efforts ended infailure.)Yes. I do. Actually I’ve been wanting to stop for a long time.I have even tried a few times by myself, but all my efforts ended infailure.)
E5Don’t worry. We are here to provide you with professional guidance.We’ll make a plan together and support you with follow-up calls andconsultations, until you are able to make a positive change.33
M5但我还是没有信心。我怕我抵抗不了烟瘾。之前我尝试戒烟的时候，整天都头痛、恶心，吃饭也没有胃口。太难受了！But I still have no confidence. I’m afraid I won’t be able to resistthe cravings. I was suffering from headaches, nausea and a poor appetiteall day long last time I tried to stop smoking. It’s awful!
E6Those are common withdrawal symptoms caused by the addiction tonicotine. I believe with your willpower and our tailor-made program, youwill win this battle eventually.26
M6那好吧。希望这次真的可以戒烟成功。那就请您为我制定合适的计划吧。Alright. I hope I can really quite for good this time. So pleasemake a suitable plan for me.

entry.title: 家暴求助
entry.content:
Susan, a Mandarin-speaking woman, has made an appointment with asupport worker at the Women and Children Support Centre in Melbourne.She wishes to discuss issues she’s been facing with her husband at home.* * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Hi! Susan, is it? Please take a seat. Oh, I see you’re expecting.How far along are you?18
M1我怀孕五个月了。这是我第三个孩子。上周我才知道怀的是个女孩儿。I’m five months pregnant. It’s my third child. I just found out lastweek that it's a girl.
E2That’s fantastic. Congratulations! So what brings you here today?Are you facing any kind of difficulties at the moment? If I may ask, areyou single, married or do you have a partner?33
M2我结婚了，嫁给了一个澳洲男人。我们在一起 6 年了。您瞧，我的邻居建议我来见您，因为我的家庭一直存在些问题。我过去几周情况变得越来越糟了。现在我很担心我孩子们的安全。I’m married to an Australian man. We’ve been together for 6 years.Look, my neighbour recommended I see you because of the problems I’vebeen having at home. Over the past few weeks it’s just been gettingworse and worse. And now I am worried about the safety of mychildren.
E3I understand. It sounds like you’re talking about domestic violence.You did the right thing in taking your neighbor’s advice. Susan, pleasetrust me when I say that you can open up to me and tell me your problemsand I will try our best to help you out.61
M3我和我丈夫时不时会吵架。我们吵架时，他有时会把我绊倒或者扯我的头发。有几次他还打我们的两个儿子。你知道, 他们还很小，他们一个 5 岁，一个才 3 岁。My husband and I have quarrels from time to time. When we get into arow he sometimes does things like trip me over or pull my hair. He hasalso beaten our two sons a few times. You know, they are still quiteyoung, one 5 and the other only 3.
E4His behaviour is certainly unacceptable! There is no excuse forviolence against women or children. Everyone has the right to feel safein their own home. If we work together, we can find a way to protectboth you and the children.42
M4我觉得我很傻，我当初真不该认识他。这么多年我一直想申请暴力禁止令，但是因为害怕我丈夫所以我就没这么做。我真是太懦弱了。I feel so stupid. I regret the day I ever met him. Over the yearsI’ve considered applying for an AVO, but I didn’t do it out of fear ofmy husband. I’m such a coward.
E5You’re not a coward, Susan. Anyone in your situation would feel thesame. But you’ve taken a positive step by coming to see me today. Canyou tell me, Susan，have you ever suffered from depression oranxiety?38
M5有时我觉得活着没意思。我甚至还考虑过自杀。但我一想到我再也见不到我的孩子们了我就改变了主意。他们让我的生命有了光彩，没有他们我什么都不是。Sometimes I feel like life is not worth living. I’ve even consideredsuicide. But when I think about not being able to see my kids anymore Ichange my mind. They light up my life and I'm nothing without them.
E6Look, Susan, I’ve been a counsellor here at the Women and ChildrenSupport Centre for over 10 years, and during that time I’ve met manywomen in similar situations to you. For most women who don’t apply foran intervention order, the situation gets worse and the consequences canbe serious.51
M6我知道了，我之前读过干涉令的一些信息。但是如果我要申请的话，我和孩子去哪住呢？我在墨尔本没有亲人。而且现在我所有的朋友都不来找我了，就是因为我老公的原因。I know. I’ve read some information about intervention orders. But ifI do apply for one, where are my children and I supposed to live? I’vegot no relatives in Melbourne, and none of my friends come to see meanymore because of my husband.
E7There are refuges available that provide safe accommodation forpeople in this situation. The staff there coud give you practical andemotional support. I’m not saying it’s an easy process. But the mostimportant thing is that you have a support network here for you. You arenot alone in this.51
M7谢谢你今天跟我聊这么多。我又重新感觉生活有希望了。Thank you for talking with me today. I feel like there is some hopeagain.

entry.title: 起始津贴
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Mr Zhang, who has just lost his job, and aCentrelink officer, John * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good morning, Mr Zhang, I’m your case officer. How can I help youtoday?14
M1早上好，我的工厂最近裁员，不幸的是我是其中的一个。没有这个收入，我的家庭现在生活很困难。Good morning. My factory has recently laid off employees, andunfortunately I was one of them. Without this income, my family ishaving difficulty making ends meet.
E2In terms of your situation, I think we are able to help you througha variety of payments such as the Family Tax Benefit and NewstartAllowance. First of all, I need to determine whether you are eligiblefor these allowances. Can I have a look at your ID please?50
M2给你。我们全家三年前就成为澳大利亚永久居民了。但从来都没问政府要过救济。我也希望我可以尽快找到工作，这样就可以不需要靠救济金度日了。Here it is. My family and I became permanent residents of Australiathree years ago. But we have never asked for government benefits. I hopeI can find a job soon so that I don’t need to count on yourpayments.
E3Don’t worry. It’s our responsibility to help people get throughdifficulties. Since you meet the residency requirement, you should beable to claim the Newstart Allowance if you also pass the income andassets tests.35
M3好的，如果能在这个时候得到一笔钱，真的是雪中送炭呀。您能为我解释一下怎样才能通过收入与资产测试？Okay. It would be such a timely relief if I could get some moneynow. Could you explain to me how I can pass the income and assetstest?
E4You may not receive Newstart Allowance straight away if you earn$600 per fortnight. You can refer to our website if you need to acquiremore information about this. Now, I believe you should be aware of somejob seeker workshops that will increase your chances of getting employedas soon as possible.53
M4我还听说你们有举办帮助寻工者尽快就业的讲习班？我有资格参加么？都会涉及到哪些内容？我需要做什么？I also heard that you have some workshops to help job seekers getemployed as soon as possible. Am I eligible to register? What will becovered in these workshops? What do I need to do?
E5Of course, you are. The workshops cover a wide range of topicsincluding local labour market opportunities, job search techniques andskills that are in demand and other services. As part of the workshop,you are required to pass an activity test to continue claiming theallowance.47
M5寻工活动评估？那是关于什么的？是意味着我必须参加这些活动, 不然就没有补助金?如果偶尔不去，会对我的收入有影响吗？Activity test? What’s that about? Does it mean I have to participatein all the activities, otherwise no payment? If I miss it occasionally,will it affect the payments that I’m about to claim?
E6It is used to measure if you are actively looking for a job throughparticipating in employment expos and workshops. After we design a planand you have agreed to it, you’ll have to participate in the activities.Otherwise, there will be a “No show, no pay” penalty.48
M6好的我知道了。谢谢您的解释。Got it. Thanks for the explanation.

entry.title: 正齿计划
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between Ms. Zhong and a dentist, Dr James. Thisdialogue is about Ms. Zhong’s daughter’s teeth problems. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good afternoon Ms. Zhong. Thank you for coming in. Please have aseat.13
M1牙医您好。我想请您看一下我女儿 Amy的牙齿。她的上下两排牙齿都不怎么齐，我觉得可能有必要矫正一下。Hello doctor. I’d like you to check my daughter Amy’s teeth. Herupper and lower teeth are not very straight. I think it may be necessaryto straighten them.
E2Let me see. You are right. Amy definitely has some alignmentproblems. Some of her teeth are overlapping, and some others have gapsbetween them. She also has an overbite.30
M2是啊，我担心以后影响美观，还有就是我发现她刷牙不容易刷干净，可能也是因为牙齿太参差不齐了。That’s right. I’m worried that it may affect her appearance in thefuture. I also noticed that she has difficulty brushing her teethproperly, probably because her teeth are too crooked.
E3That could be part of the reason indeed. Fortunately, your daughteris only 14 years old, and these problems can easily be fixed by wearingbraces.26
M3我和她爸爸也是这么想的。如果趁年纪还小矫正过来，这对孩子长大以后的自信心也有帮助。Her father and I think so too. If the problems can be fixed when sheis still young, it will also be good for her self-confidence when shegrows up.
E4Exactly. Many of my patients have self-esteem issues. They tend tobe very self-conscious when smiling or speaking, and not as confident ingeneral.24
M4这正是我所担心的，我希望我女儿成为一个开朗活泼的人。那您看我女儿的情况，要多久才能矫正过来？That’s exactly what I’m concerned about. I hope my daughter grows upto be a happy, outgoing person. In my daughter’s case, how long do youthink it will take for her teeth to be fixed?
E5It may take up to three years. I need to watch how much force to puton her teeth and let them move bit by bit. Too much force is likely todamage the gums.35
M5虽然时间很长，不过从长远来看也是有必要的。那怎么开始做呢？请您为我们安排。That’s quite a long time, but it’ll be worth it in the long run. Howshould we start then? Please arrange it for us.
E6Sure. I’ll make another appointment with you and your daughter inthe following week, then I can examine her teeth more closely and make atreatment plan. How’s 10am next Thursday?31
M6没问题，到时我们再来。谢谢您。No problem. We’ll be here then. Thank you.

entry.title: 谈性骚扰
entry.content: This dialogue is an interview between a mandarin-speaking journalistand a guest professor who is an expert in the study of sexualharassment. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | |E1 | 您的到场让我倍感荣幸，教授。非常感谢您能以专业的视角探讨性骚扰这个话题，并和我们分享一些您的看法。 | I am very honoured by yourpresence, professor. I will be highly grateful if you could offer yourprofessional perspectives on the topic of sexual harassment and sharewith me some of your points of view on this issue. | | M1 | And I amvery glad to be here and thanks for having me. I will try and addressyour issues to the very best of my ability. | 27 | | E2 |太好了。谢谢。现在人们的共识是，性骚扰就是指在性的方面骚扰某人。这个定义准确吗？ | Great. Thank you. Now it is common knowledge thatsexual harassment indicates bothering someone in a sexual way. Is thisan accurate definition? | | M2 | No, I am afraid not. It is in fact aviolation of the Civil Rights Act. The confusing aspect is thatperpetrators are not arrested. This is because sexual harassment is nota violation of state criminal codes. Rather, remedy is through civillitigation. | 44 | | E3 |谢谢您为我们解释清楚。那么，就定义而言，如果我说，工作场所的性骚扰可以发生在任何时间、任何地点，发生在任何两个人之间，这种说法对吗？ |Thanks for your clarification. Speaking of the definition, am I right insaying that workplace sexual harassment can occur anytime, anywhere,between any two people? | | M3 | Not really. As in the discussion above,workplace sexual harassment can occur outside the office, but it cannotoccur between any two people. The harassment must take place betweenpeople who work together. | 33 | | E4 |我明白了。那骚扰者一定必须是老板或者上级吗？如果是客户或顾客呢？如果他们做出不当性关注，会怎么样呢？这算是性骚扰吗？ | I see. So theharasser has to be a boss or supervisor? What about a client or acustomer? What if they make unwanted sexual advances? Can it be regardedas sexual harassment? | | M4 | The same definition applies. If theharasser is a co-worker, not a boss, it can also be regarded as sexualharassment. The workplace is supposed to be a safe place where employeesare protected from any inappropriate or promiscuous actions bycustomers, vendors, or clients. | 45 | | E5 |如果不当触碰只发生了一次会怎样？那就不算性骚扰，是吗？我听说性骚扰的受害者并不一定是异性，对吗？ | What if the unwanted touching occursonly once, that is not a sexual harassment, is it? I’ve also heard thatthe victim of sexual harassment does not necessarily have to be of theopposite gender, do they? | | M5 | That is correct; people can also becapable of committing sexual harassment against individuals of the samesex under current laws.
