I don’t want to go back home so soon.| | E2 | Don't worry, Mr. Wang. I'm here to help you with this. Butfirstly, please tell me more about your education background and theexact date of expiry of your student visa. | 31 | | M2 |希望你们真的能帮到我。我是 2010 年 2 月 24 号持 573 学生签证来澳洲读书的，我在 UNSW 学建筑学的本科。 | I hope you can help me out. I came toAustralia for study on a 573 visa on 24th February 2010. I did aBachelor of Architecture at the University of NSW. | | E3 | Umm … Let mehave a look at your file. Yes, your student visa is going to expire nextmonth, and you are not entitled to apply for a SkilledGraduatesTemporary Visa, since your occupation is not on the SkilledOccupation List. | 43 | | M3 |我来澳洲的时候我的专业还是在这个列表里的，但是去年 7 月份这个职业就不再是移民专业了。所以我现在处境很艰难，而且我现在也很难找到工作申请工作签证。我还能怎么办呢？ | My occupation was on the list when Iarrived but it hasn’t been since July last year. So I’m in a verydifficult situation. Besides, it’s very hard for me to get a job toapply for a working visa. What else can I do? | | E4 | My suggestion isthat you apply for another course which matches the SOL. For example,you can apply for a TAFE course closely related to your occupation suchas welding, bricklaying, tiling and so on. Then you may have a betterchance to secure permanent employment as well as to apply for yourpermanent residency after you graduate. | 58 | | M4 |啊？这些在中国都是低等且没前途的工作，干这个会给人笑的。而且这些工作干一辈子也赚不了多少钱啊，我父母是不会同意的。 | What? In China, theseare all considered inferior jobs with no real future prospects. I willbe looked down upon if I pick on of those professions. Also, even if Ido this job my life, I won’t earn much. My parents will never agree. | |E5 | Mr Wang. You shouldn’t be biased towards these occupations. InAustralia, every occupation is treated equally. Occupations that I havementioned above are all on the SOL, and you can earn a considerableincome if you have one of those jobs. Most importantly, you can easilyget a permanent resident visa under any GSM Scheme or EmployerNomination Scheme. | 59 | | M5 |是这样啊，那我知道了。那未来几年移民政策还会变么？这些职业该不会很快又不在列表上了吧。 | All right, I understand. Will there be otherchanges to the immigration policy in the near future? Is it possiblethat those occupations will be removed from the list soon? | | E6 | Atthis stage, I can tell you all these occupations are still in highdemand. However, I cannot guarantee no change will occur, because theSOL is subject to a series of variations. We are not responsible for anyfuture changes to the list. | 44 | | M6 |这就是我担心的。我第一次来的时候我也以为我的专业在这个国家，尤其是偏远地区还是很急缺的。谁知后来说变就变了。算了，我还是再去别家中介问问看吧。 | That’s my concern. When I first came here I thought myoccupation was in high demand, especially in remote areas. Who couldpredict the sudden change that followed? Never mind, I’d better go tosome other agents and make some enquiries. |

entry.title: 腿肿就医
entry.content: The following is a dialogue between an orthopaedic specialist (S) andMr. Tian (T), who accidently fell and injured his right leg. * * * | ID| Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Good morning Mr.Tian. I’ve examined the X-ray image. There is no obvious damage to thebone in your right leg. | 21 | | M1 |那我就放心一点了。我还以为我摔断了腿呢，因为实在是疼痛难忍。而且，腿已经肿了有十天了，可把我吓坏了。 | I am a little bit relievednow as I was thinking that I’d broken my leg as the pain was unbearable.Also, the swelling persisted for ten days and I was really terrified. || E2 | As an orthopaedic specialist, I can tell you that the swellingwas due to soft tissue damage, and physiotherapy sessions would hugelybenefit your recovery. | 25 | | M2 | 我听说那个物理治疗很贵的。 况且，我也不方便经常去那么远的地 方。您能不能就只是给我开点药呢？ | I heardthat physiotherapy is rather expensive. Also, it’s really inconvenientfor me to travel this far on a regular basis. Can you prescribe somedrugs instead? | | E3 | Actually Mr. Tian, regular physical treatmentsuch as massage, hydrotherapy and physical exercise would all be muchmore beneficial and effective than drugs or surgery. | 25 | | M3 |确实如此。可是，我还是需要先跟我的家人商量一下，才能给你一个确切的回复。我这两天跟他们说了之后，再告诉你。 | That’s so true…nevertheless, I’ll still need to discuss this matter with my familybefore I can give you a definite answer. I’ll let you know within acouple of days after I've done that. | | E4 | That’s fine. But you knowthat the sooner you start treatment, the better your chances of a fullrecovery are. But please know that the related costs are not covered byMedicare. | 31 | | M4 |这可真成问题了。我贷款盖了房子，可是房贷还没有付完，我也没有足够多的存款啊。我怎么能负担得起这么长期的治疗呢？ | That is a realproblem. I haven’t paid off my home loan that I took while building myhouse and I don’t have enough savings either. How can I afford suchlengthy treatment now? | | E5 | Are you covered by any private healthinsurance? You just have to work out a plan to focus on your recovery.After all you are still a young man and you have a bright future. | 35 || M5 | 我目前还没有。您能不能帮我查一下，我是否能获得某种治疗费用上的优惠？或者，我能分期付款吗？ | I don’t have one at the moment. Can youplease check whether I could get some sort of concession for thetreatment? Or can I pay the fees in instalments? | | E6 | I’ll talk tothe director of the financial department about this issue. In myopinion, they may well consider your financial position and give yousome discount. | 27 | | M6 | 那太谢谢您了。非常感激。 | Thank you verymuch for that. Truly appreciated. |

entry.title: PTE 流程&题型
entry.content:
PTE

Pearson Test of English Academic: 培生英语语言测试

考试 71 道小题， 180分钟。


Pearson 注册登陆官网: https://mypte.pearsonpte.com/

注册成功后直接进行 Booking 预约

模考卷

官方模考卷购买链接: https://www.pearsonpte.com/preparation

模考切记使用苹果Airpod或其他蓝牙耳机，我两次模考打水飘就因为用了蓝牙耳机， 模糊， 不识别。

如果用了蓝牙耳机发音没有分， 可以截图， 通过官网申诉获得模考重制,😈亲测重制了A,B,C三套卷。

entry.title: 车祸调节
entry.content: This dialogue is about a motor vehicle accident and takes placeoutside a courtroom between a woman and a barrister. * * * | ID |Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Mrs Wu, the insurancecompany has accepted liability for the accident which means we don’tneed any witnesses to give evidence. | 21 | | M1 |这是什么意思？是不是意味着这场官司我一定会赢？我能拿到我想要的赔偿金吗？ | What does this mean? Does it mean I will definitely win thecase? Can I get the compensation I want? | | E2 | ID They just admittedthat they have responsibility to cover the damage caused by theaccident, but they don't consider the damage to be quite as serious asyou do. I’d advise you to settle it out of court. | 39 | | M2 |我不明白。不是说我不需要证人了，那就说明我的要求是合理的。我打赢这场官司的可能性是很大的，为什么要庭外和解呢？ | I don’t understand. Yousaid I don’t need any witnesses. That means I have a good chance to winthis case, why should I settle it out of court? | | E3 | The problem isyour wrist didn’t start to bother you until six months after theaccident. The judge may decide your wrist injury was not caused by theaccident and only award you a small sum of money for the injury to yourleg. | 44 | | M3 |这不是真的。当救护车驾驶员把我从车里抬出来的时候，我的腿部已经受了伤，正在出血伤得很严重。在医院接受 X 光检查时，医生发现我的手腕也受了伤。 | 40That is not true. When the paramedics took me from theambulance, my leg was injured and bleeding. It was very serious. When Ihad an X ray in the hospital, the doctor found that my wrist was alsoinjured. | | E4 | Why didn’t you tell me this earlier Mrs Wu, I didn’teven know X-rays were taken. This is very important information. | 21 || M4 | 我怎么会知道？我压根儿忘了提它，你应该帮助我，你是律师，你应该是知道法律在这个国家是如何运行的。它与我们国家完全不一样, 所以我一头雾水。 | 44How should I have known this was important? I totallyforgot about it. You should help me. You are a lawyer and you shouldknow how the legal system works here. It is totally different fromChina, so I have no clue at all. | | E5 | I put forward an offer to themof $15,000 inclusive of all costs, but they didn’t agree to it. Theyhave come back with a counter offer of only $7,500, which will leave youwith approximately $1,500 clear after paying all medical expenses andlegal costs. | 46 | | M5 | 律师费和医疗费需六千澳元?简直不可思议。这和抢劫有什么区别。人人都想从中捞一把，我才是真正的受伤者。 | Medical and legal costs are$6000? This is ridiculous, it's almost like robbery. I am the victim buteveryone else is benefiting from this. | | E6 | Please calm down. Thisfigure is based on the evidence you have. You cannot just ask forwhatever amount you want. | 21 | | M6 |好吧，事已至此，我还能怎么样！请你尽量帮我打赢 官司。 | Alright. Thereis nothing I can do now. Please try your best to win the case. |

entry.title: 腰痛复诊
entry.content:
Mrs.Guo, who previously suffered from lumbago, is talking to her GPagain. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 |Good morning Mrs. Guo. How are you feeling? Has the pain in your lowerback improved? | 22 | | M1 |早上好医生。我的腰还是老样子。每次咳嗽、打喷嚏都会疼，只能天天吃止痛药。您让我去拍 X 光，又叫我去做骨密度测验，结果出来了吗？ | Morning.It is still the same. It kills me every time I cough or sneeze, so Ihave to take painkillers every day. You asked me to do an X-ray and abone density test. Have you gotten the results? | | E2 | Yes, I receivedthe results three days ago. Based on the X-ray and bone density testresult, you’re suffering from osteoporosis-induced fractures in thespine. | 25 | | M2 |骨质疏松？啊，对了，上次您提到过这个可能性的。那天回家后我儿子帮我上网查了一下，说那是缺钙引起的。 | Osteoporosis? Ah yes. Last time youmentioned the possibility of this. I asked my son to do some onlineresearch for me and he said it is caused by a lack of calcium. | | E3 |Precisely. The lack of calcium in your bones makes them weak and moresusceptible to fractures. Your persistent back pain was a result offractures in your spine. | 28 | | M3 |这个病该怎么治呢？我儿子让我吃钙片， 说这样能让我以后不会轻易骨折。我现在一天吃一片，您说这有用吗？ | How do you treat this condition?My son asked me to take calcium supplements, saying they would preventme from breaking my bones easily. I take one pill per day. Do you thinkit helps? | | E4 | Calcium supplements can indeed help to reduce furtherfractures, but its effectiveness is relatively low. I will alsoprescribe some other medication to strengthen your bones. | 26 | | M4 |唉，我最近吃的药片越来越多了。那这个药怎么吃？有什么副作用？我怕吃这么多药，虽然老毛病治好了，又引起新毛病。 | I’m having more and morepills. How should I take the medicine? Are there any side effects? I’mworried that the pills will solve the old problems while causing newones. | | E5 | You take this medication once a week on an empty stomach.You will need to avoid food or lying down for the half an hourfollowing. It may cause reflux, so I would recommend you cease takingyour anti-inflammatory medication. | 40 | | M5 |可是我的腰还是疼啊。扑热息痛我还能不能继续吃？或者您再给开个什么 药？ |But my back is still hurting. Can I continue to take paracetamol? Or canyou prescribe something else? | | E6 | You can continue to takeparacetamol as long as you do not exceed 4g every 24 hours. As for yourback pain, I’ll prescribe an analgesic patch for you, which does notinteract with your new medication. | 37 | | M6 | 好的， 谢谢您，希望能把这腰疼治好， 不然这平常什么都做不了。 | All right, thank you.Hopefully, the back pain will go away soon, otherwise I won’t even beable to perform daily activities. |
背景:
Lumbag: 腰痛 /lʌm'beɪgəʊ/ A common, painful condition affecting thelower portion of the spine (脊柱). Low back pain is caused byinjury to a muscle (strain) or ligament (sprain). Commoncauses include improper lifting, poor posture, lack of regular exercise,a fracture, a (ruptured disc 腰椎间盘突出) orarthritis (关节炎). Often, the only symptom is pain in thelower back. People may experience: Pain areas: in the back, muscles andbones, hip, or leg Sensory: leg numbness or pins and needles Alsocommon: back joint dysfunction or muscle spasms Most low back pain goesaway on its own in two to four weeks. Physiotherapy and pain relieverscan hel . A few cases may require surgery
重点:

entry.title: 疗乳腺癌
entry.content:
Mrs Wu, is consulting her doctor about the breast cancer. * * * | ID| Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 |我真是不明白为什么我会得乳腺癌呢？ 我一直认为癌症应该是老年人的问题。 |I really don't understand why I got breast cancer. I always thoughtcancer is a Geriatric problem. | | M1 | Breath cancer is verycommon among middle age people. There many factors that can leads tobreast cancer. For example, never having given birth to ababy, and having had problem with breast feeding. |乳腺癌在中年人中非常普遍。有很多因素可以导致乳腺癌。例如，从未生过孩子，并且母乳喂养有问题。| | E2 | 我还以为没什么大不了的， 我当时要是注意一点就好了，现在想来，那些得乳腺癌的名人好像都没有生过小孩。 | No wonder I haven'thad any milk since I gave birth to my daughter. I thought it was no bigdeal. Now I come to think of it, none of those celebrities with breastcancer seem to have had children. | | M2 | Well that's not the onlyreasons, modern lifestyle, dite and environmental factors can also berisk factors. I have your X-Ray here. From these pictures we can seethere is an abnormal growth in your left breast. |嗯，这不是唯一的原因，现代生活方式，饮食和环境因素也可能是危险因素。我这里有你的X光片。从这些图片中我们可以看到您的左乳房有异常生长。| | E3 | 是不是把肿块切除就可以了，我听说乳腺癌还算是治愈率比较高的癌症， 不像肝癌什么的，得了就基本上等于判死刑了。 | if I have the lump removed,would I be fine? I heard that the cure rate of breast cancer is higherthan others. No like liver cancer, if you get it, you willbasically be sentenced to death. | | M3 | The problem is thegrowth (增生), compare with the last month this lump has growbigger. So Mastectomy (乳房切除术) will be the best optionfor you. Otherwise the cancer cells may invade (入侵) othertissue with in the body. |问题是增生，和上个月相比这个肿块变大了。所以乳房切除术将是你最好的选择。否则癌细胞可能会侵入体内的其他组织。| | E4 | 乳房切除术？ 真的需要这样么？看来我的问题还很严重可是我不愿意做这个手术你知道这将影响到我的体型的。 |Mastectomy? Is this really necessary? It seems that my problem is stillvery serious, but I don't want to do this operation. You know it willaffect my body shape. | | M4 | Well, this is the only way to cure yourbreast cancer I am afraid, otherwise Metastasis (转移) cancause great damage to other part of your body, and could be muchdifficult to control. | 好吧，恐怕这是治愈乳腺癌的唯一方法，否则转移会对身体其他部位造成很大的损害，而且很难控制。| | E5 | 好的那术后需要多长时间来恢复呢？ | Okay, so how long can Irecover after the surgery. | | M5 | You need to have review, within 3month of the surgery, this is to make sure there is no Metastasis in theperipheral areas. |你需要在手术后3个月内进行复查，以确保没有转移到周边区域。 | | E6 |三到六个月也不是很长的时间， 我想我可以做这个手术，那手术会安排在什么时间呢？ 我这周五有一个很重要的会议。我想等那以后再手术。 | Three to six months is not a long time. I think Ican have the operation. When will the operation be scheduled? I have avery important meeting this Friday and I want to wait until then。 | |M6 | That's fine but you need fast for 24 hours before the surgery. |很好，但是您需要在手术前24小时禁食。 |
背景:
Breast Cancer 乳腺癌: Symptoms of breast cancerinclude a lump(肿块) in the breast, bloody discharge(出血) from the nipple (乳头) and changes in the shapeor texture of the nipple or breast.乳腺癌的症状包括乳房内的肿块，乳头流出的血以及乳头或乳房形状或质地的改变。
Treatment depends on the stage of cancer. It may consist ofchemotherapy (化疗), radiation (方疗) and surgery.治疗取决于癌症的发展阶段。它可能包括化疗、放疗和手术。
重点:

entry.title: 食物中毒
entry.content:
Mr Smith is a British man working at a branch of a multinationalcorporation in Beijing. He has suddenly felt dizzy(晕眩的)and fatigued (疲乏), and has come to a nearby hospital, wherehe sees doctor Wei. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- |--- | | M1 | 史密斯先生你好可以简单请您简单的描述一下你的病情么？ |Hello Mr. Smith, could you please briefly describe yourcondition? | | E1 | Well, the weather was really nice today,so I decided to go for a walk in the park. At first everything seemedfine, but an hour later I started to feel dizzy and lacked the energy todo anything. | 今天天气很好，所以我决定去公园散步。刚开始好像一切都正常，但是一个小时以后我开始感觉头晕并且没力气做任何事。| | M2 | 恩，这样吧，我先给您量一下体温和血压好吗？嗯，36.8°，体温很正常。低压80，高压120，也很正常啊。您最近休息得好吗？ | I see. I’llcheck your body temperature and blood pressure now. Hmm, yourtemperature is 36.8° degrees Celsius., that’s very normal.Your blood pressure is 120 over 80, which is also verynormal. Have you been resting well lately? | | E2 | Yes I go to bedbefore 10 everynight. | 是的，我每天晚上都在10点之前去睡觉。 | | M3 |嗯很好最近的工作压力大么？ | Hmm, good. Do you feel stress from workrecentely? | | E3 | It's been Little more hectic (忙碌),Recently I was promoted to the deputy director (副总经理).And yesterday my colleagues threw party for me to celebrate.And I tried many delicious Chinese dishes. |是有一些忙碌，我最近刚被提拔为我们公司的副总经理。而且昨天我的同事给我开了一个庆祝晚会，我尝试了很多美味的中国菜 | | M4 | 哟，那可真要祝贺您啦。 您都吃了那些东西啊？ | Ah! Then I mustcongratulate you (contratulations on you)! What kind of things didyou eat?] | | E4 | Thank you. I was most taken with the spicy chickendish and stir-fried tofu. I also tried mushroom, and raw fish – which Ihad never eaten before – in fact my co-workers had to urge me totry it. When I finally gave in, I found it mostdelightful (非常好吃). |谢谢。我很喜欢吃辣鸡肉料理和炒豆腐。我还尝试了蘑菇和生鱼，这些都是我之前从来没吃过的。事实上是我的同事怂恿我去尝试的。我最终屈服了，还发现它非常好吃。| | M5 | 我觉得问题就出现在这里。首先，吃野生动物存在着很大的危险性；鲜蘑菇一定要确保无毒、干净才可以吃；海鲜也最好不要生吃。 | I think thisis where the problem started. Eating wild animals is veryrisky. Firstly, raw mushrooms should be checked to see if they arenon-poisonous and clean before eating. As for seafood, it’sbest not eaten raw. | | E5 | Oh, I had no idea. During yesterday’sfestivities (庆祝活动), I tried many dishes I didn’t evenknow the names for. So from now on, I will be more careful about what Ieat. |噢，我不知道。在昨天的庆祝活动上，我尝试了许多我连名字都叫不上来的菜。从现在开始，我将会对要入口的食物更加谨慎。| | M6 |对，“吃一堑，长一智”嘛！这样吧，我先给您开一个药方吧。每天早中晚三次，一次三片。一个疗程后就您就会感觉好些了！| You can put it down to experience / (take it as a lessonslearned). OK, so I’ll write you out a prescription. Take three tablets aday, morning, noon and night. After one course you shouldfeel much better. | | E6 | Thank you. | 谢谢 |
重点:

entry.title: 经济舱症
entry.content:
A yong women is consultanting her GP about Air-Travel * * * | ID |Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Good Afternoon MissXu, I understand you about to go to Europ for a month long holiday. |下午好，徐小姐，我了解到你要去欧洲度假一个月。 | | M1 |是的医生这也是我今天来见你的原因，最近在电视和报纸上报道了许多关于经济舱综合症的事儿，我这次到欧洲旅游要乘20多个小时的飞机，买的就是经济舱的票， 您说我会得经济舱综合症么？ | Yes, doctor, that'swhy I came to see you today. Recentely, there have been a lot of reportsabout Economic-Class-Syndrome on TV and Nespapers. It will take me over20 hours to fly to Europe, I bought an economic ticket. Do you think Iwill get Economic-Class-Syndrome? | | E2 | There are many factors thatcan predispose someone to developing economyclass syndrome. These factors can be genetic (基因；/dʒɪ'netɪk/) or life style realted, seating still forlong period of time is unfortunately one of them, which is why its ofenoccurs among travellers on long distance air-flight. |有很多因素会使人容易患上经济舱综合征。这些因素可能是基因或生活方式的关系，不幸的是，长时间坐着不动是其中之一，这就是为什么它经常发生在长途飞行的旅客中。| | M2 | 对， 我就是看了九号电视台的新闻时事节目，才知道远程飞行可能会导致经济舱综合症的，以前我从没听说过这种病也不了解所以非常担心。 | Yes, I just watchedA current Affair on Channel Nine and realized thatlong-distance flight may cause Economy Class Syndrome. I have neverheard of this disease before and I don’t understand it. | | E3 | Ok, howabout people who suffer from it, almost always have additional riskfactors. Such as Coronary Heart Disease, smokingand family history of thrombosis or a high dosesof Combined Oral Contraceptives. Do any of this apply to you?| 好吧，那么患有这种病的人呢， 他们几乎总是有另外的风险因素，如冠心病，吸烟和家族遗传的血栓或高剂量的复方口服避孕药。| | M3 |我正在服用复方口服避孕药是这个医疗中心的另一位医生给我的，不过我没有家族史，从不吸烟， 也没有心脏病。 | I'm on a Combined OralContraceptives pill that was given to me by another doctor at thismedical center, but I have no family history, never smoked,and I don't have a heart disease. | | E4 | The risk of you getting DVTduring your flight is very low. and that risk can be further reduced ifyou heed a number of recommendations |你在飞行中患上深度静脉血栓(Deep VeinThrombosis)的风险非常低。如果你听从一些建议，这种风险可以进一步降低| | M4 | 要不要停止服用我的避孕药呢？我的朋友建议我吃阿司匹林，说这样能减少我得经济舱综合症的风险， 这是真的吗？ | Should I stop takingmy Combined Oral Contraceptives? My friend suggested me to take aspirin,saying it would reduce the risk of getting Economy Class Syndrome. Isthis true? | | E5 | You don't need to cease to taking yourpills as the risks a lot, and for aspirn its may causeexcessive bleeding in some cases. So I would not recommendthat you take it as a preventative measure. |你不必停药，因为风险太大，而且阿司匹林有时会引起大出血。所以我不建议你把它作为一种预防措施。 | | M5 |听你解释后我就放心了心了， 我平时很少坐长途飞机，所以担心会得这种综合症， 现在我不担心了， 谢谢你医生。 | After hearingyour explanation, I feel relieved. I don't take long-distance flightsoften, so I am worried about developing this syndrome. Now I am notworried anymore. Thank you doctor. | | E6 | You are welcome, have a safeand happy trip. | 不用谢，一路平安，旅途愉快。 |
背景
Economy class syndrome 经济舱并发症: the formationof blood clots (血凝块) in veins (静脉) deepwithin the legs deep vein thrombosis (深度静脉血栓), occuringduring (or just after) a long airplane flight, especially in economyclass (tourist class) where there is the least space allotted perpassenger and legs tend especially to be immobilized for lackof leg room.
The economy class syndrome is directly related to immobility for longperiods during which blood pools in the legs, raising the risk of clotformation. The tendency to immobility is often compounded bythe fasten-seat belt sign, the presence of carts in the aisles, etc.Other risk factors (风险因素) contributing to the syndromeinclude lower oxygen pressure and dehydration. Changes in oxygenpressure in the cabin tend to decrease the oxygen level in the blood.The air in the cabin lacks the normal degree of humidity whichcontributes to dehydration. The serving of coffee, tea and alcoholicbeverages (all of which are diuretics) further causespassengers to become dehydrated. The economy class syndrome is notconfined(受限制) to that class on a plane. It is recommendedthat all persons traveling on air flights, irrespective of which clssthey are in, drink lots of water and move their legs by salking wheneverpossible and by periodically flexing and extending their ankles,knees, and hips(臀部) to minimize risk of economy class syndrome.Deep Vein Thrombosis is potentially serious and can even havefatal consequences.
重点

entry.title: 家庭暴力
entry.content:
A Chinese woman, Mrs. Qian, has been helped by a women’s refuge toobtain a temporary intervention order against her husband because sheclaims he has been beating her up. She is now living with friends at asecret address, and has gone back to see the lawyer, Dane Gray, todiscuss what needs to happen next. * * * | ID | Original | Translated || --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Good morning, The court granted theintervention order last Wednesday. Has your husband tried to contact yousince then? | 19 | | M1 |他尝试过。上个周五他送花到我朋友的餐馆，我朋友把花交给我了。 | He has.Last Friday he sent flowers to my friend’s restaurant and my friend gaveme the flowers. | | E2 | He’s not supposed to do that. Once theApprehended Domestic Violence Order has been served on him, he’s notallowed to make any attempt to contact you. Does he know where you livenow? | 34 | | M2 |不知道，要是他知道了，我就永远躲不开他了。可能上个周五他还没收到法院的信吧。也许警察联系不上他。 | No, he doesn’t. If he knew, I wouldnever get rid of him. Maybe he hadn’t received the letter from the courtlast Friday. Maybe the police couldn’t get in touch with him. | | E3 |I’ll find out when he actually received it. If he sent you the flowersafter the order had been served on him, he’s in breach of the order andwe need to go straight back to court. | 37 | | M3 |你看，我也不想他受到什么惩罚，我只想他离我远点就可以了。你说我们还要去一次，是为什么？ | Look, it’s not that I want him to be punished.I just want to keep him away from me. You’re saying we have to go to thecourt again. What’s that for? | | E4 | The order was just an interimorder to keep your husband away until the court could consider the casefully. When we go back next week, we’ll have to present more evidence. |33 | | M4 | 可是上次出庭的时候我把我的地址 – 旧的那个 –交给法官。要是这次要给他新的地址，我丈夫就知道我住在哪里了。他会来抓我的。 | But last time Igave my previous address to the magistrate. If I provide my new one, myhusband will know where I live. He will come and get me. | | E5 | Don’tworry. The court will let you write your address on a piece of paper andhand it to the magistrate. | 21 | | M5 |对不起，我总是很紧张，很害怕。可我再也不想被他打了。下次出庭前我们需要什么证据呢？ | Sorry I’m always nervous and terrified. I don’twant to be beaten up. What evidence do we need to prepare for the nexthearing? | | E6 | Evidence that proves he did actually attack youphysically –. Did you ever go to see a doctor after one of theseincidents? | 23 | | M6 |我是有这样的证据。昨天我在看我们蜜月的照片，我穿了件无袖上装，两个胳膊上都能看到瘀青。连我们度蜜月的时候他都打我，你能相信么？ | I havethis sort of proof. While I was looking at our honeymoon picturesyesterday, I noticed I was wearing a sleeveless top and you can seebruises on my arms. Can you believe he even beat me on our honeymoon?|
重点:

entry.title: 投资咨询
entry.content:
A Mandarin-speaking customer has come into the office of aninvestment broker to make some enquiries about investment options. * * *| ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | M1 |您好。非常感谢你这么短时间就过来见我。我过来是想聊一聊投资的事情。首先我想知道自住房需要付资产增值税吗？ | Hello. Thank you for coming tosee me at such short notice. I have some investment enquiries to discusswith you. Firstly, I’d like to know if I need to pay capital gains taxon a property I’m buying to live in myself? | | E1 | No, you don't andthank you for coming in today. Could you tell me what kind of plans youhave for your investment? |不，你不用，谢谢你今天来。你能告诉我你有什么样的投资计划吗？ | | M2 |那就好。我打算买些投资房， 我听说买公寓的镂花是不用付印花税的， 对吧？ |That's good. I'm planning tobuy some investment properties. I heard thatyou don't have to pay stamp  for buying apartmetnsoff-the-plan, is that right? | | E2 | Yes, you're right. Youmay be eligible for a First Home Owner Grant. When your property issettled, you can hand it over to real estate agents to manage. They willgive you a set return on investment. |你是对的。您可能有资格获得“首次置业者补助金”。财产结算后，您可以将其交给房地产经纪人进行管理。他们会给你固定的投资回报。 | | M3 | 那么， 投资回报一般是多少呢，够我还房贷么？ | How much return can I get? Would that be enough for meto pay my mortgage? | | E3 | It should be enough. ROI varies from 4% to6%. The good thing is depreciation of your preperty and the furnitureyou buy can be used to offset the tax. |应该足够了。投资回报率从4％到6％不等。好处是您的财产贬值，您购买的家具可以用来抵税。| | M4 | 那太好了。 我也在担心交税的问题，和每个季度要填写的商业活动报表， 真是复杂啊。 | That's great. I'm alsoconcerned about paying tax, and the Business Activity Statement that Ihave to fill in each quarter, it seems really complicated. | | E4 |You're right. The ATO stipulates that if the turnover of abusiness is over \(76,000, you're advisedto register for <udl>GST</udl> and lodge your<udl>BAS</udl> every 3 months. | 你是对的。澳大利亚税务局(ATO)规定，如果企业营业额超过\)76,000，建议您每三个月注册一次商品及服务税(GST)并提交您的(BAS)营业活动报表。| | M5 | 嗯， 我记住了。 如果净收入10万以上的话，成立家庭信托账户比较有用， 对吧？ | Yeah, I remember that. If the grossis over $100,000, a family trust would be useful, is that right? | | E5| Ah, yes. You can also use your ABN for all of these. However, if youwant to register a formal company, then you will need to apply for aACN. |是的。您也可以将澳大利亚企业注册码(ABN)用于所有这些。但是，如果要注册正式公司，则必须申请澳洲公司注册号(ACN)。| | M6 | 好的， 我想这些我都明白。 商会的人建议我可以考虑买农场，屠宰场或葡萄酒厂， 你觉得我该选哪一个？ | Ok, I think I understandeverything you have talked about. Someone in the Chamber ofCommerce recommended that I consider buying a farm,abbattoir or winery. Which do you think I should choose? | |E6 | Well I think a winery would probably be a good Choice. The marketis growing exponentially. |嗯，我想酿酒厂可能是个不错的选择。市场呈指数级增长。 |
重点:

entry.title: 老人授权
entry.content:
Mr. Lu is speaking to his solicitor about power of attorney. * * * |ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Good afternoon,Mr. Lu. What can I do for you? | 下午好，陆先生。我能为您做些什么? | |M1 | 我这次来是因为我的母亲。她已经83岁了， 患阿尔兹海默症已经五年了。最近她的病情已经恶化到她无法管理自己财政的地步了，所以我想在她还有认知能力的时候签一份授权书， 让我做她的代理人。 | Theappointment is for my mother. She is 83 and has had Alzheimer's diseasefor five years. Her condition is so serious that she can't manage herfinances. So we'd like her to arrange a power of attorney while she isstill capable, appointing me as her executor. | | E2 | I see. And youhave discussed this with her already? | 我知道了。您已经和她讨论过了吗？| | M2 | 是的。 上次她忘了付电话费， 结果电话线被公司切断了，我无法打电话跟她练习， 还以为出了什么事， 吓了一大跳。从那之后她也承认授权书有它的好处了。 | Yes. She forgot to pay hertelephone bill last time so the telephone company cut off her service.We couldn't get in touch with her, so we were terrified atthe thought that something bad might have happened. So since then shehas also accepted that signing a power of attorney is in herinterests. | | E3 | I'm sorry to hear about her decline. Given thecircumstances, I gather you would be wanting an enduring power ofattorney rather than a general one then? | 听到她的衰退， 我很遗憾。这个情况下，我想你应该是想要一份持续授权委托书而不是一份普通的授权委托书。| | M3 | 我并不知道授权书分为两类。 这两者之间有什么区别呢？ | I didn'tknow there are <>two types of power of attorney. What's thedifference between them? | | E4 | A general power of attorneywill terminate when the person who made it loses mentalcapacity. An enduring power of attorney can continue topay her bills, manage her accounts etc. on her behalf. |普通授权委托书将在授权委托书的订立人丧失精神能力时终止。持久授权书可以代表她继续支付账单、管理账户等 | | M4 |对我们需要的就是第二种。 这种持久授权书该如何办理呢？我是不是得将我母亲带到您这儿呢？ | Yes, the later is what we need. Howcan we get a power of attorney? Do I need to bring my mother here? | |E5 | Yes. Your mother would need to sign the enduring power ofattorney in the presence of an appropriate witness. Iwould have to explain the document and its implications>to her and assess whether she has understood before witnessing hersignature. |是的。你母亲需要在合适的证人在场的情况下签署永久授权,。我必须向她解释文件及其含义(可能的影响)，并在她签字之前评估她是否理解。| | M5 | 行， 您下周有没有空？ 有空我就带我的母亲到这里来。还得麻烦您此草这份授权书。 | Fine. Are you available next week? If soI'll bring my mum here. Please also draft the document. | | E6 | You candownload a Power of Attorney form from the NSW GuardianshipTribunal website, and get her to either fill it out at home, orfill it out here with my help. |你可以从新南威尔士州(NSW)监护人仲裁庭的网站上下载一份授权书表格，让她在家填写，或者在我的帮助下在这里填写。| | M6 | 这份表格这么重要， 我想如果您能帮忙填的话就不太容易出错。 |This form is so important that I think it would be less errorif you can help us fill it out. |
重点:

entry.title: 钻脚出庭
entry.content:
Mrs. Wang is being cross-examined at a NSW District Court hearing fora work-related injury. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | ---| --- | | E1 | You swore yesterday to tell the truth and nothing but thetruth. Lying under oath constitutes perjury and it could incriminateyou. |你昨天发誓要讲真话，而且只讲真话。宣誓后说谎构成伪证罪，可能会使你受到牵连。| | M1 | 没问题。 我是个守法和信奉宗教的人， 从来都说真话，而且我已经当着法官、 律师和陪审团的面， 手按圣经发过誓了。 | No problem.I am a law-abiding and religious person who always tells the truth. AlsoI have sworn on the bible before the judge, lawyers and jury. | | E2 |You said during examination-in-chief that on the 23rd ofAprial, 2009 you were drilling holes in some cylinders. Then you hadaccidently hit the workbench and you dropped the drill which landed onyour right foot. Is that right? |您在总检查中说，2009年4月23日，您在一些钢瓶上钻孔。然后，您不小心碰到了工作台，钻头掉落了在你右脚上的，是这样么？ | | M2 | 那一天呢， 有一批货到了， 外面的工人正在用叉车卸货，然后， 他们把这些东西堆放到最高的架子上。 | That day, a shipment justarrived. The workers outside were using the forklift tounload all the cargo. They then stacked on the highest shelf. | | E3 |According to your legal representative, you sufferedexcruciating pain in your right foot, Correct? |根据您的法律代表 / (律师)，您的右脚遭受了极大的痛苦对吗？ | |M3 | 不仅仅是砸到了我的脚上， 我的腰部和头部也受了伤。急救人员把我送到了， 我的头部缝了五针。 大夫为我安排了康复计划。 | Notonly my foot was hit, but my back and head were also injured. Thefirst aid people / (Paramedic) sent me to the hospital whereI had five stitches on my head. The doctor arranged arehabilitation program/ (recovering plan) for me. | | E4 | Iput it to you that you have exaggerated your injuries in order to getmore money for compensation. The specialists for theinsurance company stated in their reports that you fully recoveredand you could return to your normal duties. |我告诉你，你夸大了自己的受伤程度，为的是得到更多的赔偿。保险公司的专家在他们的报告中说，你已经完全康复，可以恢复正常工作了。| | M4 | 虽然我的脚已经恢复， 但是腰部仍然痛的厉害。 X光照片显示，我的椎间盘突出。 | I Though my foot has recovered, my back still hurtsbadly. The X-ray shows that I have a protruded disc. | | E5 |I put to you that your back problem is due to pre-existingdegenerative(退化) changes caused by age. I have evidence toprove that you're as fit as a fiddle (非常健康；身体很好)now. A video shows you power-walking with your workmate inyour suburb on the 8th of February 2010. |我告诉你，你的背部问题是由年龄引起的预先存在的退行性变化 (退化)引起的。我有证据证明你现在身体很好。一段视频显示，2010年2月8日，你和你的同事在郊区快步走。| | M5 | 在播放录像之前， 我必须说明一下这人的身份， 据称她长得很像我，但你必须注意， 我有一个孪生姐姐， 她就住在我这条街上， 就在我隔壁。 |Before playing the video I have to clarify the identity of this person.It is said that she looks very much like me. But you need to realizethat I have a twin sister who lives on the same street, right next doorto me. | | E6 | I haven't seen any information regarding this person inthe file. Can you please give me more details about your twin sister? |我在文件中没有看到有关此人的任何信息。你给我能提供更多关于你的双胞胎妹妹的详细信息吗？| | M6 | 她叫王琳， 我们2004年一起来的澳洲。 她现住在我那条街的18号，现在在一家超市做会计。 | Her name is Wang Lin. We came here together in2004. She lives in ID 18 on the same street as me and works as anaccountant in a supermarket. |

entry.title: 朝阳租房
entry.content:
A business man named Mr Brown has just moved to Beijing and islooking for a new house to rent. He is having a discussion with Mrs Lu,a Mandarin-speaking real estate agent. * * * | ID | Original |Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | M1 | 您好， 有什么可以帮到您吗？ |Hello, how can I help you today? | | E1 | Hello. My name's Gary Brown.I've just moved to the area and I'm looking for an apartment to rent. |你好。我叫加里·布朗。我刚搬到这个地区，正在找一套公寓出租。 | | M2 |您好， 布朗先生。 你想住在北京的哪一块而呢？ | Hello, Mr. Brown. Wheredo you want to live in Beijing? | | E2 | Well, I'm starting my new jobas a DJ for Tango Club in Chaoyang district, so I would like to get aplace relatively close to my workplace and the subway. | 好的，我的新工作是朝阳区探戈俱乐部的DJ(音乐主持人)，所以我想找一个离工作地点和地铁都比较近的地方。| | M3 | 嗯， 我知道这个俱乐部， 很受外国人的欢迎。 来，您看看这份传单， 上面列出了目前朝阳区可以租的房子。 您想住几间卧室的呢？有什么特殊需要么？ | Ah, I know that club. It's very popular withforeigners. Here, have a look at this leaflet, it lists all theproperties currently available in Chaoyang. How many bedrooms would youlike? Do you have any special requirements? | | E3 | I'm looking for aplace with a decent-sized kitchen, as well as an extractorfan. A one-bedroom or studio apartment would be fine, but I'm open totwo even three-bedroom apartments if they're available |我正在找一个地方，有一个像样的厨房，以及一个排气扇。一居室或一室一厅的公寓都可以，但如果有两个甚至三个卧室的公寓，我也可以接受。| | M4 | 我知道很多外国人不喜欢蹲式厕所， 对吧？ 嗯，您看第四页， 上面是位于光华路目前可以租的房子。 | I know many foreignersdon’t like squat toilets, right? Hmm, Have a look on thefourth page, It lists information about properties currently availablefor rent on Guanghua Road. | | E4 | I see that's aone-bedroom place. You guys are asking ¥3000 a month. Well, that's wayout of my budget. |我知道那是一居室。你们要求3000块人民币一个月。嗯，这超出了我的预算。 | |M5 | 朝阳区的价格贵， 这是肯定的。 但是您看下755号这间，才¥2200元而且刚刚装修过， 里面还有壁炉呢。 | Chaoyang is anexpensive district, that's for sure. But have a llook at the one on 755.Only 2200 yuan and it's recently renovated. It even has a fireplace. | |E5 | When was the building built? I rented an apartment in Macau lastyear that was built sometime in the 80s. The elevator only worked untilmidnight. You can imagine coming home after a night shift and having towalk 10 flights of stairs. |大楼是什么时候建成的我去年在澳门租了一套公寓，是在80年代的某个时候建的。电梯只开到午夜。你可以想象当你上完晚班回家，还得爬10层楼梯。| | M6 | 这没问题的。 这楼是2001年建成的， 电梯一周七天24小时运行。 |That won't be a problem. This building was built in 2001, and theelevator runs 24/7. | | E6 | Well that's good. Well I'm guessing, then,that the utilities bills are extra? And how about the bond? How much isthat? | 好,很好。我猜，水电费是要另外算的， 那么押金如何呢？那个多少钱？| | M7 | 对， 租客需要自己负担水电煤网的费用。 押金的话，相当于三个月的租金， 还有一个月的押金， 签字的时候交。这是在中国约定俗成的。 | That's right, tenants pay for their ownelectricity, water and gas. As for bond, it's 3 months' rent plus aone-month security deposit when you sign. This is standard practice allover China. |

entry.title: 钻头扎脚
entry.content:
A worker’s compensation solicitor is speaking with Mr. Li about hiscase. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 |Good morning, Mr Li. I've asked you to come in because your worker'scompensation case is being heard next week. You have a conference withthe barrister on Monday, but before you see her, I'd like to check someinformation about your accident. |李先生，早上好。我已要求您参加，因为下周将审理您的工人的赔偿案。您星期一与大律师举行会议，但是在您见到大律师之前，我想查看一些有关您的事故的信息。| | M1 | 好的， 不过事情已经过去一年多了， 我不一定记得所有的细节了。法院也算是认真的， 拖了这么久才开庭。 | Ok, but it's been more than oneyear ago, So I may not be able to remember all the details. The courthas delayed the hearing for so long. | | E2 | Not to worry.I've got your file here, so we can use that to refresh your memory. Itsays here that the accident at CMB Manufacturing happened in August2008. Can you tell me how long you'd been working there before you hadthe accident? | 不要担心。我这里有你的档案，我们可以用来帮助你回忆。这里说事故发生于2008年8月在CMB 制造厂。你能告诉我在发生事故之前你在那里工作了多长时间吗？ | | M2 |我之前在另一家公司工作， 后来我回国了， 因为我母亲生病了， 那好像是 ···我想想 ··· 2007 年底。 我大约在2008年3月开始在CMB工作。 | I used to workfor another company, afterwards I went back to China because my motherwas sick. That was ... let me see ... at the end of 2007. I startedworking for CMB in March 2008. | | E3 | you'd been at CMB for about fivemonths. Now, can you tell me exactly what you were doing when theaccident happened |您已经在CMB待了五个月。现在，您能确切告诉我事故发生时您在做什么吗？ | |M3 | 当时我正在给金属圆筒钻孔。 有个叫Frank的同事走了过来，开始开始跟我说话。 | I was drilling on a metal cylinder. Aworkmate called Frank came and began talking to me. He is kind of personlike making joke. He did this to everyone. Sometimes, hedid stupid things. | | E4 | It would be better to restrictyourself to describing exactly what happened on the day in question. SoFrank came over to talk to you. What happened then. |你最好限制自己只是描述当天发生的事。 所以 Frank 过来跟你讲话。然后发生了什么？ | | M4 | 他评论了几句我身上的T恤。 然后他开始挠我的痒。我很怕痒的， 所以我挥动手臂来制止他。 我拿着钻头的手打到了墙壁。我觉得很疼， 手一松， 钻头就掉在我的脚上。 | He made some comments aboutthe T-shirt I was wearing before tickling me. I am quiteticklish so I waved my arm to stop him. My hand that washolding the drill hit the wall and it was very painful so I lost my gripand the drill fell on my foot. | | E5 | Then what happened? |然后发生了什么？ | | M5 | 经理来了， 他叫了救护车。急诊室的医生清理了伤口， 但是几周之后不得不动了手术，因为有些神经和肌腱损伤了。 我现在还在做理疗。 | The manager came andcalled the ambulance. The doctor in the emergency room cleaned upthe wound. but I had to have surgery a few weeks later becausesome nerves and tendons were injured. I am stilltaking physiotherapy (理疗). | | E6 | Fine. You'll probablybe appearing as a witness, which means you could becross-examined by CMB's barrister. Unless, of course, wereach an out-of-court settlement. Now, are there any question? |好的。您可能会作为证人出庭，这意味着您可能会被CMB的大律师交叉盘问。当然，除非我们达成庭外和解。现在，有什么问题吗？| | M6 | 没问题了， 非常感谢您。 | No, Thank you very much. |
重点:
拓展：
Cross examination by prosecution

entry.title: 操心妈妈
entry.content:
A head-teacher is talking to Mrs. Li, the mother of a student calledJohn, regarding John’s recent changes. * * * | ID | Original |Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Good afternoon. You must be Mrs.Li, John's mother. My name is Adam Taylor. How are you today? |下午好。你一定是约翰的母亲李太太。我叫亚当·泰勒。你今天好吗？ | | M1 |你好， 老师。 我儿子最近整天做白日梦， 快把我急死了。 | Hi teacher. Myson has been daydreaming all day recently, it's getting on my nerves. || E2 | Well, I'm surprised to hear that John is having a problem. He isa brilliant boy, and has been doing quite well at school. What exactlydo you mean by daydreaming? |嗯，我很惊讶听到约翰有问题。他是个聪明的孩子，在学校一直表现很好。你说的白日做梦到底是什么意思？| | M2 |我们花了那么多钱和精力送他进了这里最好的私立小学。一开始他还好好地， 每天认真学习。 那是从上个月， 他就变了个人似的。有许多不切实际的想法。 | We spent a lot of money and effort sending himto the best privagte primary school. At first he was quite Ok, studyinghard every day but since last month, he seems to have become anotherperson and has many unrealistic thoughts. | | E3 | You said that Johnhas changed a lot since last month. Were there any unusual incidentsthat led to these changes? Also, what kind of changes are we talkingabout here? |你说约翰上个月以来变化很大。有没有什么不寻常的事件导致了这些变化，我们在这里讨论的是什么样的变化?| | M3 | 他先是一直说自己想成为一个足球明星。然后这周又开始说自己想做一个歌星。我又不知道下周他得蹦出什么个奇怪的想法了。 | He first said he wanted tobecome a football star. But this week he said he wanted to become asinger. I'm not sure waht strange thoughts he will have next week. | |E4 | I see. Please don't be too worried. Small children are soimaginative that they are bound to have many thoughts. Ithink it's a good sign in some way. It shows that John is anenthusiastic little boy.. |我知道了。请不要太担心。小孩子很有想象力，因此他们必然会有很多想法。我认为这在某种程度上是一个好兆头。它表明约翰是一个热情的小男孩。| | M4 | 你这么说好像也有道理， 不过， 他这么小小年纪的， 就总想当明星，想出名， 我也不知道他从哪里学来那么多稀奇古怪的东西。 | What you justsaid seems to make sense, However, he always wants to be a star and befamous at such a young age. I don't know where such strange thoughs comefrom. | | E5 | Children today are exposed to all kinds of information,good and bad, so parents should be aware of what information their kidsare receiving. He's at a formative age, where he is trying to discoverhis interests and aptitudes. | 现在的小朋友能接触到很多不同的信息，无论是好的还是不好的。 所以父母应该了解他们的还在就收到了什么信息。你儿子正处于性格形成的年龄，这个年龄的还则回去尝试发现他们自己的兴趣和才能。 | | M5 |天资和兴趣？ 请告诉我，我怎么才能更好的知道我儿子的天资和兴趣呢？ | Aptitudes andinterests? Please tell me how I can get a better idea of my son'saptitudes and interests? | | E6 | There are many ways. Pay attention towhat subjects John likes the most, what he enjoys doing after school,and what he likes talking about at home. |有很多方法。注意约翰最喜欢的科目，他喜欢放学后做什么，他喜欢在家里谈论什么。| | M6 | 跟你谈完之后， 我感觉我可能确实是小题大做了。我不是很了解儿童的心里， 所以孩子的一点变化就让我感到恐慌。现在我明白一些了。 谢谢你， 老师。 | after talking to you, I feel I wasmaking too big deal out of it. Since I don't know much about children'sminds, a slight change can have me panicking. Now I have a betterunderstanding. Thank you, Mr Taylor. |
重点:

entry.title: python 实现深拷贝
entry.content:
在不使用 deepcopy() 的前提下， 实现对 { { 嵌套字典 }} 的深拷贝



为什么要深拷贝?

当添加对拷贝的dictionary进行， 添加、 删除、 等 ···, 修操作的时候，原字典 与 拷贝的字典 之间会产生相互影响 (一个改变另一个也会随之改变)。

深拷贝 deepcopy:



上述 相互影响 可通过 deepcopy() 解决，由于深拷贝有别于正常逻辑下的普通拷贝和浅拷贝。


深复制: 将原有数据 完整的再复制 , 产生一个 全新独立 的个体。



浅拷贝: shallowcopy

浅拷贝: 在原有数据上 打上一个标签， 当标签被数据被修改，原有数据会被改变， 其他的标签也会被改变。



深 v 浅

两者到底有什么不同？ 这里简单 <代码> 演示一下:

当字典只有一层时， 例🌰:{ 1:'ONE' }

输出:

从上可以看出， 普通拷贝 d2 = d1 与 copy()是有区别的， 普通拷贝在任何情况下都会被原始字典中的变化所改变，而浅拷贝可以应对简单的字典数据， 然而不足以应对复杂的字典数据。


那么举一个复杂字典的例子🌰:{ 1:{ 2:'TWO' } }


输出:

从上可以看出, 当原始字典存在多层嵌套时，浅拷贝d2 = copy.copy(d1) 和 普通拷贝d2 = d1均不能保证拷贝数据不受原始数据改变的影响；从而在这种情况下我们需要使用copy.deepcopy()


然而我们这次的课题是：“在不实用deepcopy()的前提下实现对复杂字典的拷贝，并保证拷贝数据与原始数据不会相互影响。所以👇🏻下面言归正传： ”


实现深拷贝

其实将 深拷贝 拆分为： 浅拷贝 +递归 就容易理解多了

写一个函数, 通过递归 Recursion 来实现:


举例🌰说明: { 1:{ 2:{ 3:{ 4:'Four' } } } }

输出:

实战

Cleanup .csv data, and create dic copy that change one copy withoutchanging the other.


Reference:

  1. python详解copy浅复制和deepcopy深复制、字典类型的copy以及"= "
  2. Python字典的深拷贝实现
  3. Python如何在dic（字典）里面添加dic（字典）附dic基础知识

entry.title: 老无所养
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between a special benefit applicant, Mr. Li and aCentrelink officer Susan. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- |--- | --- | | E1 | Good morning, Mr. Li. My name is Susan. You put in aclaim for a special benefit. You know you've come here for aninterview regarding your claim, don't you? |李先生，早上好。我叫苏珊。您提出一项特殊福利金的请求。您是知道您来这里是为这个请求进行面试的对吗？| | M1 | 我知道， 你有什么问题尽管问好了， 反正我的材料都是真实的，希望你能尽快做决定， 我已经等了好久了， 你们怎么这么慢呢？ | I know whyI'm here. You can ask any questions you want. All of my documents aregenuine. I hope you can make a decision as soon as possible.I have been waiting for a long time. Why is it taking so long? | | E2 |We will try our best to make a decision as soon as we can. After thisinterview, you should hear from us in two weeks. According to yourdocuments, you rent a place in Miranda. Is there any reason why youcan't live with your daughter? |我们将尽力做出决定。采访之后，您应该在两周内收到我们的来信。根据您的文件，您在米兰达（Miranda）租了一个地方。有什么理由不能和女儿住在一起？| | M2 | 我前妻住在那里， 如果我再搬进去会特别不方便，并且跟我前妻一见面就吵架， 还是不见的好。 | My ex-wife lives with her.It would be very embarrassing to live with them, basides, my ex-wife andI will argue ifwe see each other, so it is better not to see each other.| | E3 | Fair enough. According to our records, you stopped working in2012. How have you supported yourself since then? | 有道理,根据我们的记录，您在2012年停止工作。自那时以来，您如何养活自己？ | | M3| 以前打工的时候存了点钱， 积蓄花完了之后， 都是我女儿在帮我。 | I savedsome money when I worked. After I spent my savings my daughter supportedme. | | E4 | I see. FRom the bank statement you submitted before, youhad $20,000 in your commonwealth Bank account, where did that money go |我知道了。从您之前提交的银行对帐单中，您的联邦银行帐户中有2万块钱，这笔钱去了哪里？| | M4 | 我都花了， 我身体不好， 看医生要花钱， 我还开到了，并且离婚也花了不少钱。 | I spent all of the money. It costs money to seedoctors as I am not physically fit 身体不健康 andI also had an operation. I spent a lot of money on the divorce as well.| | E5 | Es far as I know, it is free to have an operation. How much didyou spend on your divorce? | 据我了解，手术是免费的。你离婚花了多少钱？| | M5 | 我不记得了， 反正很多钱 | I can't remember. Anyway it was a lotof money. | | E6 | Mr.Li, for us to make a decision, you need to submitsome evidence to show where you money went. All the expenses have to bereasonable and only to meet your basic daily needs. I'll give you 14days to submit the supporting documents. | 李先生为了我们能做出决定，你需要提交证明， 以证明你的钱用在什么地方， 所有的开销必须都是合理的，并且只是用于日常的基本开销。 我会给你14天的时间准备并提交这些支持文件(辅助材料) | | M6 | 我知道了， 我会尽快去搜集这些材料的。我没有任何收入， 这是我唯一的希望， 你们要尽快做决定，我的日子不好过啊。 | I understand. I will gather (prepare)those documents as soon as I can. I don't have any income. This paymentis my only hope. I hope you can make a decision soon. My life is reallyhard. |
重点:

entry.title: 九元时薪
entry.content:
This is a dialogue over the phone between a worker and his advisor atFair Work Australia. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- |--- | | E1 | Mr. Wang, I understan that you have lodged a complaint withus at Fair Work Australia and that you wish to speak with an advisorhere. Can you tell me that exactly you'd like to work out with yourformer employer? |王先生，我想知道您已在澳大利亚公平公正委员会向我们投诉，并希望在这里与顾问交谈。您能告诉我，您确认想与前雇主算账么？| | M1 | 我打从去年五月就在这家咖啡厅工作， 老板是华人， 处处欺负我，少算我工资不提， 竟然无缘无故在我最需要收入的时候把我解雇了！ | Istarted working at this café in May last year. The owner is Chinese, butbullied me in every possible way. Besides miscalculation of my wages, hefired me without any explanation when I really needed the income. | | E2| It sounds like there are a few issues other than unfair dismissal.Firstly, can you tell me how exactly your employer miscalculated yourwages? | 听起来，除了无故解雇你之外，还有其他一些问题。首先，您能告诉我您的雇主究竟是如何误算了您的工资吗？ | | M2 | 好的。我的是心只不过是九元， 可是他竟然还不算我观点前清理厨房的半小时，说什么那段时间咖啡厅没有客人， 没有生意也就没有理由负我额外的钱 | OK. Myhourly rate was only 9 dollars. However, he didn't count the half anhour of cleaning the kitchen before closing, saying that since there areno customers in the café during the period, no business means no reasonto pay me. | | E3 | What he did was actually illegal. Nine dollars anhour is well under the minimum wage. He's obviously evaded income taxand short-changed you by expecting you to work extra hours which werenot paid. |他所做的实际上是非法的。每小时九美元远低于最低工资。他显然是在逃避所得税，并通过期望您加班而没有支付工资，从而使您变短了。| | M3 | 是啊， 但我初来乍到对这些权益都不了解，加上看在他给我第一份工， 就这么忍受了他的不公待遇一年多了。可是上周他突然叫我不用去上班了， 我一下子没了收入。 | Yes, but I put upwith his unfair treatment because I didn't understand there rights whenI first arrived here and he gave me my first job. However, last weekendhe just suddenly asked me not to work anymore. | | E4 | Did you see anyreason why he could possibly consider terminating your employment? Youhave worked for him for over 14 months so he must have been satisfiedwith you performance in general. |您是否看到他为什么可以考虑终止您的工作的任何原因？您已经为他工作了14个月以上，所以他一定满意你一直以来的的表现。 | | M4 | 是的， 我工作勤奋又有效率，我想很可能是因为他的外甥放暑假， 在找临时工， 他为了省钱才把我解雇。 |Yes, I'm a diligent and efficient worker. I think he fired me to savemoney because his nephew is on summer vacation and is looking for atemporary job. | | E5 | We will certainly look into this. You mentionedhe bullied you at work. Can you explain this in further detail? |我们一定会对此进行调查。你提到他在工作中欺负你。您可以进一步详细解释吗？| | M5 | 没错， 他总是挑剔我的腔调， 说我和杨客人的对话听起来很滑稽，笑我笨并常常骂我 | That's right. He always picked on myaccent and said that I sounded funny when talking withwestern customers. He mocked me, called me stupid and oftencalled me names. | | E6 | That does constitute bullying hisrepeted verbal taunts toward you were unreasonable. I believe we nowhave a clearer picture of your situation, I’ll make some notes in thecomplaint you’ve made and we shall get back to you this week. |这确实构成了欺凌,他重复的口头嘲讽对你是不合理的。我相信我们现在可以更清楚地了解您的情况，我会在您的投诉中记下一些记号，我们将在本周与您联系。| | M6 | 那太好了， 我会等你们给我电邮答复， 谢谢你了。 | That's great,I'll wait for your reply. Thank you. |
重点:

entry.title: 工伤自付
entry.content:
Mr. Zhang is talking with a solicitor about a workers’ compensationclaim. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 |Good Morning, Mr. Zhang. According to our records, you've booked anappointment today to talk about workers compensation Am I right? |早上好，张先生，根据我们的记录，您之前预订过一个会面，谈论关于职工补偿的问题，对吗？| | M1 | 是的， 我之前来过一次， 但是由于家里有急事， 就急忙赶回去了。 |Yes, I came once before but had a rush home due to a family emergency. || E2 | I see. I need to know as many details about the accident aspossible. Could you start by telling me what you do for a living and howyou got injured? | 我知道了， 我需要知道这个意外的细节 | | M2 |我是一个建筑工人， 非常熟悉操作规程(Protocols) 和安全规则，至今没有出过一次事故。 可是两个月前， 我在搬运铁板的时候弄伤了胳膊。 |I'm a construction worker. I'm very familiar with operation and safetyprotocols and I had never got caught in an accident until two months agowhen my arm got injured while I was moving iron platesplanels. | | E3 | Is the injury to your arm severe? What treatment have you received so far? Also, what did your boss doafter the accident? |手臂受伤严重吗？到目前为止，您接受了什么治疗？另外，事故发生后您的老板做了什么？| | M3 | 老板把我送进医院， 他不让我说是怎么受的伤，并且他保证会照顾我。 我怕不照他说的做我会工作不保，所以说在打篮球的时候受伤的。 | My boss took me to the hospital. He toldme not to say a word about how I got injured and promised he would takecare of me. Fearing I'd lose my job if I didn't do as he said I told thedoctor that I injured myself while playing basketball. | | E4 | It isapparent that your employer was worried that he might get into troublebecause of your injury. So did your employer actually keep his promiseto take care of you? |显然，您的雇主担心他可能因您的受伤而惹上麻烦。那么，您的雇主是否真的信守了照顾您的诺言？| | M4 | 他根本没有。 他根本不给我付医药费，也没有给我其他形式的金钱补助。 所以我今天才来寻求您的意见，看看我能不能获得些工伤赔偿来维持生活。 | Not at all. He didn't pay anyof my medical bills or offer other forms of financial assistance. That'swhay I'm here today hoping to get your advice on claiming workers'compenstation to ensure my livelihood. | | E5 | Well, proving your casecan be quit challanging, because your medical records all indicate asporting accident as opposed to a workplace injury. We need to findwitnesses, such as your co-workers who were at the scene at the time ofthe accident. |好吧，证明您的情况可能很难，因为您的病历都表明是运动事故，而不是工作场所受伤。我们需要找到证人，例如在事故发生时在现场的同事。| | M5 | 证人的话我到是可以找得到。 当时在场有不少工友。这之后会如何能？ | I should be able to find some (很多)witnesses. Many co-workers were there at the time. So what happens afterthat? | | E6 | well, after collecting any relevant evidence, what youneed to do is to lodge an application with the WorkersCompensation Commission. | 在收集到所有相关证据之后， 您需要做的是向工人赔偿委员会 提出申请。 | | M6 |希望希望最后我能报销我所有的医药费， 获得美洲的工伤赔偿及以及残疾福利。| Hopefuly, I will be reimbursed (报销) for all my medicalexpenses and be granted weekly Workers Compensation, Disability SupportPension. | * * *
重点:

entry.title: 邻里纠纷
entry.content:
You have been called to interpret for Mrs Lai, a Mandarin-speakingwoman, who has come into the office of Mr Wilson, a mediator. Mrs Lai iscurrently involved in a dispute with her neighbour and is seeking toresolve it by means of mediation. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | |--- | --- | --- | | E1 | Good afternoon Mrs Lai. My name is Time wilsonand I'll be looking after your case. Please take a seat and we can getstarted. | 下午好， 赖太太， 我叫 Tim Wilson, 我将会接手你的案子。请坐， 我们可以开始了。 | | M1 | 谢谢你来见我，我从来没有和邻居发生过任何问题， 这真是一个很头疼的问题。 | Thank youfor seeing me, Not once have I had a problem with my neighbours. Thiswhole situation has been such a headache. | | E2 | Yes, I read throughyour file, you said your neighbour, Bob Matt, used a chainsaw(电锯) to cut down the tree on the boundary between yourhouse and his house, but he didn't get your premission first. Is thatcorrect? | 是的， 我已经读过你的档案， 你说你的邻居BobMatt在没有征得你同意之前用链锯将你和他房子边界上的树砍了， 对吗？ | | M2| 上周四， 他连一个电话都不(Without even a phonecall)打就把树砍倒了。 他也没有清理所有的树枝和树干，弄的满地都是。 然后他还把下水管道 (Drainage Pipe / Sewerage Pipes ) 给弄坏了 | He just cut it down last Thursdaywithout so much as a phone call. And he didn't clean up all the twigsand branches either - he just left them all over the ground. Then hepulled the roots out as well, causing damage to the sewerage pipes. | |E3 | I see, so do you have any idea why he will do such thing? |我懂了， 你知道他为什么这样做么？ | | M3 |他跟我说他想在我们的房子之间修个栅栏。 他是个按摩师， 在家工作。他说我们的孩子在院子里玩的时候太吵了， 会影响他的生意。我可以理解这一点， 可是他太过分了。 | He told me he wants to build afence between our properties. He's masseur (男按摩师) andworks from home. He says our children are too noisy when they play inthe yard and that it disrupts his business. I understand that, but hewent too far. | | E4 | End tell me what kind of solution | 那么告诉我，你想要怎么处理这件事呢？ | | M4 | 我希望他能付钱请人来修理下水管道，而且如果他真的很想修围栏的话， 我希望他在修之前跟我商量。 | I'd like himto pay for someone to fix the sewerage pipes and, if he really wants togo ahead with the fence, I want him to talk to me first before he putsit up. | | E5 | Well, let me tell you a bit about mediation process, allright? We can set up a meeting between the two of you, along with amediator who will help you two explore a variety of opitons to resolveyour dispute. | 好的， 我先跟你讲一下调解的程序好么？我们会安排你们两个会面，在一个调解员的陪同下帮你们从多种选项中探求解决办法。 | | M5 |我担心Bob可能不会参加我们的调解会议。 有什么办法可以确保他参加呢？ | I'mworried that Bob's may not attend our mediation session. Isthere any way to make sure ensure he comes? | | E6 |Mediation is voluntary process and no one will be forced to attend I'mafraid. But we will try our best to convince his of why it would he inhis best interests to attend. | 调解过程是自愿的， 我有人会被强制参加。但是我将会尽力劝说并告诉他参加调解对他是最好的。 | | M6 |那就麻烦你一定要说服他去， 我要把帐彻底算清楚。 | Please do so, I wantto settle this with him once and for all. |
重点:

entry.title: 房东串门
entry.content:
Mr. Zhang has come to the Tenancy Advice and Advocacy Service to seekadvice about his tenancy. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- |--- | --- | | E1 | Hello, Mr Zhang. I understand that you are havingsome problems with your landloard and want some advice from us. Can youtell me more about is? | 张先生, 你好！ 我知道你和你的房东有些矛盾，所以希望征求我们的建议。 你能详细说说么？ | | M1 | 是的。我不知道到底我自己是对还是错的。 我是新来到这个国家的，我对这里的法律不大熟悉。 但我的房东经常跑到我的房子来 | Sure. I don'tknow whether I am right or wrong. I am new to this country and don'tknow much about the laws here. But my landlord is visiting me too often.| | E2 | Has he ever asked for your premission or produced an order fromthe Consumer, Trader & Tenancy Tribunal? | 他没有征得我的同意，或者从CTTT, 消费者， 商人与租务仲裁庭哪里申请到一份法令呢？ | | E2 |没有， 他从不事先通知我， 就将他的东西及垃圾放在后院。 当我抱怨时，他就说这是他的房子， 他喜欢怎么做， 就可以怎么做。 | ID He always putshis things and garbage in the backyard without letting me knowbeforehand. When I complained about this to him, he just said he coulddo whatever he likes because it's his house. | | E3 | Well, that'ssimply not right. The Residential Tenancy Agreements outline thelandlord's and the tenant's basic rights. The landlord has the right toenter the premises but only with the tenant's consent or with an orderfrom the CTTT. | 嗯， 这就不对了。 住房租赁合同写明了房东和租客的权利。房东只有在征得租客同意、 或者申请到了CTTT /(消费者商人与租务仲裁庭)的法令的前提下， 才能进入租客的房间。| | M3 | 我告诉他， 我认为这样做是错的， 说我们也有权利。 他呢，当我跟他说时， 却嘲笑我。 你能否告诉我， 作为租户我有什么权利呢？ | Itold him, I thought he has making that wrong, and we have the right. Buthe don't listen and laugh at me. Can you tell me, what legal right Ihave as a tanent. | | E4 | Es a tenant you are entitled to your privacyas long as you comply with your obligaations under the lease. Thelandlord can't just come whenever he pleases. |作为租客只要你遵守租约规定的义务， 你有隐私权。 房东不能想来就来。 | |M4 | 可能我不知道自己应该负些什么责任。我在签字时并不明白自己签的是什么， 因为我不懂英语。 | Perhaps I don'tknow what obligations I have. I didn't understand what it said on thecontract when I signed it, because I don't understand English. | | E5 |Well, you should have had an interpreter with you. In any case, yourobligations are to pay the rent on time, to keep the place clean and ingood order, and to tell the landlord of any repairs that are needed. |嗯， 你当时应该找个口译员陪着你。 无论如何，你的责任是安置时交房租； 保持房屋整洁； 如果房屋需要修补，通知房东。 | | M5 | 是的， 我们做的事一直是正确的。而且我们还同他房子里需要修理的东西， 但他都一一拒绝，他还说这些修理要用我们什么的押金去支付 | Yes, we always do the rightthing and we told him what repairs needed to be done to the house but herefused our requests. He said that the cost of any repairs would comeout of our bond or something. | | E6 | That's terrible! Your landlordobviously doesn't know what he's talking about. You need to make anapplication to the CTTT if you want to stay there, unless of course,you'd prefer to move out of the place. |这太糟糕了！您的房东显然不知道他在说什么。除非您希望搬出那个地方，不然如果您想继续住在那里，你就需要向CTTT提出申请。| | M6 | 你这么一说我有底气多了。 我这就去维护我的合法权益！ | I am moreconfident now with all the information you've given me. I'm going tofight (Defend; Advocate) for my legal rights. |

entry.title: 酒驾争端
entry.content:
A drunk driver is being questioned by a police officer regarding aPCA (Prescribed Concentration of Alcohol) charge. * * * | ID | Original| Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Ah here is the interpreter.Now we'll be able to understand each other. | 翻译员来了，现在我们可以明白彼此在说什么了。 | M1 | 太好了， 你终于来了！我要让他们给我解释为什么要这么对待我。他们有什么权利拘捕我？我有做错什么吗？ | Greate, you are finally here! I want them to explainwhy they've treated me this way. What right do they have to arrest me?Have I done someting wrong? | E2 | You have been brought here to thepolice station becase you refused to take a breath test, and we havereason to believe you were driving under the influence of alcohol |你被带到警局是因为你拒绝接受呼吸测试，而且我们有理由相信你刚才的驾驶收到了酒精的影响。 | M2 | 放屁！我没喝醉。 我只是在酒吧和朋友喝了几杯， 根本没喝多。 我完全清醒，也可以开车。 有个小伙子拦下我， 说我喝醉了，让我朝那个什么。。。玩意吹气。 我可不愿意 | Bullshit! I was not drunk. Ijust drank a bit with my friends at the pub and it was not much at all.I'm completely sober (冷静) and able to drive. Then a young man stoppedme, saying I was drunk and asked me to blow the ... thing. I didn't wantto do that. | | E3 | That was police constable (警员——低级别) Johnson,who saw you driving down Parramatta Rd in a dangerous manner, when hestopped you, you are abusive and refused to do the breath test. Thatmeans you are have already committed an offence, even you are under thelimit. | 那是我们的警员约翰逊， 他说你以一种危险的方式(drivingdown)沿着'帕拉马塔'路驾驶， 当他拦住你时， ( Abusive)你态度恶劣并拒绝进行呼气测醉， 这意味着即使你没有超过酒精标准，你还是犯了罪 | | M3 | 违法？ 什么叫违法？从什么时候开始和朋友看球赛转播也算是违法了？ 你们都是些种族主义者。你们专挑无辜的人， 就是因为我们不会说英文。 | Offence? What offence?Since when has watcing sports with your friends been regarded as anoffence? You are all racists. You always pick on innocent people justbecause we don't speak English. | | E4 | You're not doing yourself anyfavours carrying on like that. I suggest you calm down and take thebreath test. Otherwise it will be assumed that you are over theprescribed limit and you will be charged with PCA. |你像现在这样做下去对你没有任何的好处， 我建议你冷静下拉并进行呼吸测醉。否则你会被假定醉酒超标， 并将受到PCA指控 | | M4 | 哼， 好吧。这该死的国家他妈的根本就没有正义可言。 把这该死的东西给我， 我来吹口气。快点结束拉倒。 | Fine, okay. There is no justice in this damn /（Funcking） country. Give me this damn thing, and let meblow. I want an end to it. | | E5 | Hmm, it shows a reading of 0.15,which is well over the limit. We’ll be charging you what a high-rangePCA offence. If you could have over your licence, sir? |嗯，它显示的读数为0.15，远远超出限制标准。我们将向您收取高额PCA违法行为。先生可以将您的驾照给我么？| | M5 | 我才不给你驾照呢， 如果没了驾照， 我怎么去工作啊？ 你知道，我要养家的。 | I’m not giving you my driver’s license. How am I supposedto work without it? You know, I have to feed my family! | | E6 | Youshould have thought of that before you got into your car under theinfluence of alcohol. You’ll be appearing before a magistrate at 10 a.m.tomorrow morning. |您喝醉后到车里之前就该考虑过这一点。您明天早上10点会出庭。 | | M6 |上法庭就上法庭， 想整我？ 没那么容易。 | Fine by me! You want to give mea hard time? It won't be that easy! |
拓展:
  • DrivingUnder the Influence vs Driving with a Prescribed Content ofAlcohol

entry.title: 男女朋友
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between a social worker and a girl with someinterpersonal communication problems. * * * | ID | Original | Translated| | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Good morning. I’m Mathew and I’ll beassisting you today. So what have you made this appointment for? |早上好。我是Mathew，今天将为您提供帮助。那么，您此次预约的目的是什么呢？| | M1 | 我对自己的状态很不满意。 我觉得很难想别人敞开心扉。我想我应该要提升一下自信。 | I'm very unsatisfied with myself. It isdifficult for me to open myself up to other people. I think I need toboost my self-confidence. | | E2 | Can you tell me a little bit aboutyourself? What's your current situation? Do you live at home? |你能简单介绍一下你自己吗? 你现在住在家里么? | | M2 | 是的，我现在和我的男朋友Sam一起住。 我和他在一起很长时间了， 关系很稳定。 |Yes, I live with my boyfriend Sam. We've been together for a long timeand it's a pretty stable relationship. | | E3 | Ok, You were telling meabout your thoughts and feelings and about how you can't open up. Do youfeel that's affecting your relationship with Sam, considering he is theprimary person in your life? |好的，您是在告诉我您的想法和感受，以及您如何无法敞开心扉。考虑到他是您生活中的主要人物，您是否认为这会影响您与Sam的关系？ | | M3 | 嗯 ··· 我想是的。现在你这么说了我想是的。 Sam 又时会怀疑是否应该相信我。比如我对他说我爱你， 他不知道是不是真的，因为我对于表达自己的感受有困难。 | Hmm... I think so. Now that youmention it, I do feel it might be like that. Sam would sometimes doubtwhether he should trust me. For example when I tell him I love you, hewould wonder whether it is true, because I have difficulty expressing myfeelings. | | E4 | Ok, do you think the issue is with yourself or Sam?Do you think he is struggling to open up to you or? |好的，您认为问题出在您自己还是Sam？ 您是否认为他正在努力向你敞开心扉？ || M4 | 我觉得他不觉得对我敞开心扉很困难。我只是不确定敞开心扉是不是一件好事。他总是说我不跟他说自己生活中发生的事， 这说明我不信任他。但我并不是这么想的。 我只是觉得这是个人的事， 我不想和别人说。 | I don'tthink he is struggling to open up to me. I'm just not sure whetheropening up is a good thing. He always says that I don't tell him aboutwhat's happening in my life, hwich means I don't trust him. But that'snot true. I just think this is personal stuff, which I don't want toshare with others. | | E5 | I think we need to sort this issue out withyour boyfriend if he's stuggling to deal with the fact that you can'topen up to him. We may need to have a consultation with both of youbecause it is clear to me that he doesn't understand your feelings.Would you agree? |我认为我们需要解决你男友是否因为你不能敞开心扉而感到挣扎这个事情。我们可能需要给你们两位进行一次会诊， 以为在我看来他不理解你的感受。你同意吗？ | | M5 | 是的， 我觉得他并不理解我所经受的痛苦。他并没有意识到这是我的选择。 | Yes, I don't think he understands whatI've been through. He doesn't realise this is my choice. | | E6 | Yse,absolutely. We should all have freedom to make our own decisions. Wouldyou like to have another appointment with just me next session or youwant to bring Sam here as well? | 是的， 完全正确。我们有自由做出自己的决定。 我希望下次的见面带上SAM, 还是只有你和我？ | |M6 | 就咱俩吧。 我还没有准备好跟Sam谈这个事， 我还需要一点时间 | Justyou and me. I am not ready to talk about this with Sam. Ineed more time.|
