entry.title: .webp 格式转换
entry.content:
通过 Mac Terminal 将 .webp 格式的图片转换为 .jpg 或 .jpg 格式。


1. 转换为: .jpg


dwebp 文件名.webp -o 文件名.jpg



2. 转换为: .jpg


(换汤不换药)

dwebp 文件名.webp -o 文件名.jpg

entry.title: Dock Optimization 程序坞优化
entry.content:
1. Finder中显示当前路径:

首先打开 Terminal

关闭路径显示， 只需改 YES 为 NO。


2. Dock 中添加空白位置

$ kill Dock, ‘ D ’要大写。

建议取消在dock设置中取消Mignificant 可以无限添加，删除只需手动拖出dock, 或长按选择删除 — (见下图)。


3. Dock 动画提速(提速包括其他窗口动画)


4.使不活动的图标进入半透明状态：

defaults write com.apple.dock showhidden -bool TRUE; killall Dock


关闭:

defaults write com.apple.dock showhidden -bool False; killall Dock

Bonus. 播放(Star War)星战

telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl


5. 修改默认截图前缀:

defaults write com.apple.screencapture name "自定义项目"


Reference:

  1. 5Tricks for Advanced Mac Users

entry.title: 163 邮件发送
entry.content:
开始连接：

1. 打开 Terminal 终端

⌘ + SPACE


2. 连接163邮箱

telnet smtp.163.com 25


3. 同服务器进行 Auth 验证

helo smtp.163.com

返回： 250 OK


4. 登陆: auth login

auth login

返回的： 334 dXNlcm5hbWU6 : 就是问你要加密 过的 username 用户名。

4.1. 用户名:

(例): 你的用户名是： helloworld ⇢通过⇢BASE64译码 ⇢你将得到⇢aGVsbG93b3JsZA==

BASE64 在线译码： https://www.base64encode.org/

返回的： 334 UGFzc3dvcmQ6， 就是问你要加密过的Password 用户名。


4.2. 密码:

由于163.com 要求自行开启授权（如下图）

Tips: 纠结于IMAP / POP3 的可以参考下图

成功获取授权后，您将得到_(16位的)_客户端授权密码，此后这个客户端授权密码将代替你原本的163登陆密码当你使用imap / pop3 进行邮箱登陆。

⚠️ 你同样需要再次使用 BASE64译码 ⇢对⇢客户端授权密码 进行译码。


开始发邮件

1. 发件人邮箱

from mail: youremail@163.com

返回：250 Mail OK

⚠️ from mail， 空格必须要加。


2. 收件人邮箱**

rcpt to: <reciver@???.com>

⚠️ rcpt to, 空格必须要加。

返回：250 Mail OK


3. 编写邮件内容:

3.1. 开始编辑

data

返回： 354 End data with .


3.2. 邮件主题

输入 subject: +加+ 两次回车

subject: + ⏎ + ⏎

⚠️ 最后注意subject: 后面不要用(接): test 或 hello,会被视为 垃圾邮件 (554 DT:SPM)


3.3. 编辑正文

⚠️ 防止邮件被默认为： 垃圾邮件 (554 DT:SPM) 在输入：data 开始编辑正文之后，要外加：· · ·

FROM: youremail@163.com TO: reciver@???.comCC: youremail@163.com

开始输入正文 · · ·


3.4. 发送邮件：

. + ⏎

(英文句号.) +接+ 回车 完成并发送邮件

返回： 250 Mail Ok 表示成功

⚠️ 如果出现554 DT:SPM则被当作垃圾邮件了，请往下滑对症下药。


500 Error: bad syntax

登陆失败 - 500 Error: bad syntax

  1. 检查 from mail: & rcptmail: 的格式，主要空格
  2. 检查 hostname (不确定是否与500 Error 相关, 不过网上大量方法指向hostname)

2.1 hostname: 应该返回:127.0.0.1

  1. MacOS: 如果不是 127.0.0.1 terminal 中 命令行输入:hostname 127.0.0.1 ， 进行改写。

hostname 127.0.0.1

  1. Windows: 对比修改 /etc/hosts , 将开通为 127.0.0.1改为：


554 DT:SPM

554 DT:SPM - 垃圾邮件

554 DT:SPM发送的邮件内容包含了未被许可的信息，或被系统识别为垃圾邮件。请检查是否有用户发送病毒或者垃圾邮件；

错误原因：网易反垃圾邮件级别： * “低级”为：不做用户级过滤； *“中级”为：如果“发件人(From)”不在自己的[通讯录]和[白名单]里，并且“收件人(To)”和“抄送人(Cc)”不包括自己的地址，则认为是[垃圾邮件]；*“高级”为：如果邮件的“发件人(From)”地址不在自己的[通讯录]和[白名单]列表里，则认为来信是[垃圾邮件]。请谨慎选择此级别。

554 DT:SPM - 解决：

⚠️ 在输入： DATA 之后 要外加：FROM: youremail@163.com &TO: reciver@???.com，CC: youremail@163.com最后注意subject: 不要用: test 或 hello

Reference:

  1. 163邮箱报错:535 Error: authentication failed
  2. Interpretationof 5xx errors in Icewarp SMTP
  3. python发送简单邮件
  4. javax.mail.MessagingException:500 Error: bad syntax已解决
  5. 邮箱不可用550 User has no permission
  6. 邮箱不可用550 User has no permission(JavaMail登不进邮件系统)
  7. 学习linux之用mail命令发邮件
  8. 如何通过终端窗口发送电子邮件？
  9. 企业退信的常见问题？
  10. linux系统在终端中用SMTP协议发邮件
  11. Problemswith mail
  12. 命令行发送SMTP协议邮件（163邮箱）
  13. 网易反垃圾邮件
  14. python的smtplib 的坑 554 DT:SPM 163 smtp12

entry.title: 黑民大赦
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between an immigration officer and Mr. Peng. * * *| ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Your friendtold me briefly about your situation and I’m glad that he managed topersuade you to come and talk to us. |您的朋友向我简要介绍了您的处境，我很高兴他设法说服您来与我们交谈。 | |M1 | 你⼀定要帮我， 我现在头脑⼀⽚混乱，你不能把我遣返回国，回国我⼜是⼀⽆所有。 | You have to help me, I am totally confused, youcan’t force me to leave this country, I have nothing back there if I goback. | | E2 | Don’t worry. From what I heard from your friend, youappear to fall into the GROUP of illegal immigrants who qualify for thel> special concessionudl>ududl>ududl>(特udl>款) recently announced BY the Federal Government.Tell me, when did you come to Australia. | 不要担⼼， 据你朋友所说，你属于⾮法移⺠，你有资格获取联邦政府最新发布的特殊条款， 告诉我你是什么时候来到澳洲的。 | | M2 | 我在2003年5⽉持学⽣签证来到这⾥，在⼀所私⽴学院学了5周英语后， 我就在⼀家英语⼯⼚做全职⼯作。 | Iarriving Australia on May-2003, I was l>on a studentvi/udl>udl>, after I attends 5 week English class at privateschool, I go work as full time at an English factory. | | E3 | Won’t youaware you are not allowed to work full time on student visa? |你知不知道学生签证不允许你做全职工作? | | M3 | 我知道的，但是我需要钱来交付我的学费，否则我就⽆法延续我的签证，是否真的要对⾮法移⺠进⾏⼤赦 呢？ | Yes, Iknew that, but I need some money to pay for my tuition fee, otherwise Icould not extend my Visa. Is that True there will bel>amnes/udl>udl> for illegal immigrant. | | E4 | Iwouldn’t see that there will be an amnesty, nevertheless, people indifferent circumstances may have different concessions. |我能承诺会有大赦，然而，根据个人人情况的不同将我们也许有会做出不同的让步。| | M4 | What kind of Concessions? Does it mean that I can apply tochange my status and remain in Australia as a legal resident? |什么样的特殊待遇呢？这是否意味着我可以申请更改身份，并以合法居民身份留在澳大利亚呢？ | | E5 | No, there is no guarantee.Under these concessions, some illegal immigrants who havel>over-stay/udl>udl> will be given an opportunity to applyfor permanent residency. |不，我没有办法保证。不过在这些特殊条款下，一些逾期居留的非法移民将有机会申请永久居留权。| | M5 | 然⽽, 你们审批我申请的这段时间， 我是否会被遣返回中国?我学历⼜不⾼, 找不到像样的 (l>dece/udl>udl>) ⼯作的。 |During the processing period, is it possible that I will be sent back toChina? I don’t have a good education and won’t be able toudl>ndudl> centudl>ob. | | E6 | No action will betaken for enforce your departure, you will be granted with bridgingvisa, during the time your application is being processed. |在你申请的审理期间，我们不会采取任何措施来强制您离开，你将会获得过渡签证。| | M6 | 那我就放⼼了，像我这样的⼈就是l>廉价劳udl>ududl>ududl>Chudl>p Laudl>ur， 到处被剥削被侮辱，不过在这⾥被剥削相⽐中国要好很多udl> | Wel/udl>'mlieved. Cheap labourers like mysudl>f arehumiuudl>>ated and >exploited everywhere. But bingexploited here is better than being exploited in China. |
重点:
拓展:
如果是被遣返Remove: 遣返 或 Deport: 驱逐出境, 限制十年不得入境；十年限制期间不影响当事人以亲属或伴侣的身份入境。

entry.title: 三人租房
entry.content:
Mr. Wang is talking with an agent about renting a property. * * *
IDOriginalTranslated
E1Good Morning Mr Wang, how are you today?早上好王先⽣， 你今天怎么样？
M1早上好， 我很好谢谢你， 我今天是想问⼀下租房的问题Morning, I’m very well thank you, today I’m here today to make aninquiry about renting a property.
E2Well you have come to the right place, so what type of property doyou want to rent? Rental prices vary greatly depending on the type ofproperty.好吧，您来对地方了，那么您想租什么类型的房屋？租赁价格视房产类型而异。
M2是这样的， 我和我的两个朋友想要整租，你们这⾥都有⼀些什么样的房产呢？Me and two of my friends, would like to take a whole house. Whatkind of properties do you have?
E3Yes, that wise decisions, if you all work and you have 3people, it will be affordable for you 3 to rent a whole flat, we haveall types of property here, such as: houses, apartment,studio（⼯作室） and granny flat (孝亲房·祖⺟房).是， 这是⼀个明智的决定， 如果你们3个⼈都在⼯作，你们应该承担的起整租⼀整个公寓, 我么 有3种房产，
M3我们需要有三个卧室的房⼦， 我们不知道是house好还是appartment，你能分别介绍⼀下么， 我们想 要住在离东区不远的地⽅。We are after a place with three bedrooms. But we don't know which isthe best: a house or an apartment. Can you explain a little about each?I want to live in a place not far away from the estern suburbs.
E4No Problem, house (独⽴屋) best option for freedom, ifyou want live close to the CBD, you might want to choose apartment ASthere are few houses in that area.没问题，独立屋是自由性的最佳选择，如果您想居住在离中央商务区较近的地方，则可能要选择公寓，因为该地区的独立屋很少。
M4住在中⼼商务区会⽐较贵吧， 我们打算找那些房租在每周$500 到 %600的会⽐较好， 近⼀点也好， 但是不能超过%600，我听说有些公寓有游泳池是这样么？Isn’t CBD relatively expensive, we decide to looking for those rentwith 5 or 6 pre moths, near is great, but not exceeding 6. And we alsoheard about some apartment have swimming pool, is that correct?
E5Yes, understand, why don’t look at our list of appartment here, someare apartment do having swimming pool, but bit faraway from CBD.是的了解， 不如你先看⼀下我的不同公寓的清单， 有些公寓的确有泳池，不过距离中央商务区 稍微远⼀些。
M5嗯， 靠近CBD实在太贵， ⽽且楼太⾼不喜欢， 离得远的价格便宜，但是交通购物确实不够⽅便。Hmm, appartments closer to the CBD are indeed too expensive and tootall, which I don't like. I can afford the places which are fartheraway, but the public transport is bad and It's not convenient forshopping.
E6Or, you can rent a house with four rooms and swimming pool. The rentis slightly heigher than your stated amount, but you can always subleasethe extra room to another person to balance your rent.或者，您可以租一间有四个房间和游泳池的房子。租金略高于您指定的金额，但是您始终可以将多余的空间转租给其他人以平衡租金。
M6你说的很对， 我们也可以考虑独立房, 把多余的房⼦再转租出去，那我看⼀下你们的房屋列表吧， 谢谢 你的帮助。You are right, we can also consider house, and thensublet the extra houses, then I will look at your house list,thank you for your help.
重点:

entry.title: 房屋竞拍
entry.content:
Mrs. Liu is consulting with a solicitor about buying a property. * ** | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Hello MissLiu， Please Come in and have a seat. | 你好，刘小姐，请进请坐。 | | M1| 你好。谢谢你抽时间见我。我今天来是想要咨询一下在澳大利亚买房子的事情。 | Hello, thank you for taking the time to see me today. I’mhere today to inquire about buying property in Australia. | | E2 | Ok,have you decided on the type of property you are look after？ A house ora unit? | 好的，您确定了要关注的房屋类型么？是独栋房屋还是单元房？ | | M2 | 是house, 是在南边的⼀个区，前天和中介⼀起去看的房⼦， 整体还不错不错，不过我不懂澳⼤利亚的过户⼿续。 | Is house, at southern suburb, todaybefore yesterday I went with my agent to inspect the house, overall isquite good, am very like it, but I don’t know AustraliaConveyancing (过户;/kən'veɪənsɪŋ/) procedure. | | E3 | Youdon’t need to worry about this, I will be able to handle this for you.As your legal representative I need to know whether you are arefinancially prepared (钱准备好了么). |您无需担心，我将为您处理。作为您的法定代表人，我需要知道您的财务状况是否良好| | M3 | missing someting about financial status here...我问过中介了， 他告诉我说， 拍卖会会在下周六举⾏， 将有3到4个⼈参加，中介要我去参加拍卖会， 但是我并不知道拍卖会的流程。 | I already askedwith my agent, they told me there will be a auction nextSaturday, and my agent ask me to go, but I am notfamiliar with the auction process. | | E4 | First, youshould be eligible (有资格参与) to be admitted,during the auction, your final bid should be higher than thereserve price, and your bid must be the highest among all thebidders to get the house. |首先，您应该有有资格参与，在拍卖过程中，您的最终出价应高于底价，并且您的出价必须在所有要价的竞标者中最高。| | M4 | 哦， 我明⽩了， 中介给我建议了⼀个价格， 是⼀百⼀⼗万澳元$110W。 ⾸付是$30W 澳元， 我觉得 这个价格还可以承担。 | Ok, understood, myagent suggested a price for me, which is 1.1M, and the FirstPayment (首付) is $300K, I think the price isaffordable. | | E5 | I see, I suggest you to go online andresearch about this property, and get some detailed information aboutit. Such as: DA Approval, district planning, zoning, as well asfeature planing which you neibour will planing for theirproperty. |知道了，建议您上网研究该房产，并获取有关该房产的一些详细信息。例如：DA(DevelopmentApproval)开发申请批准，区域规划，分区和功能规划，以及您的邻居将为其财产计划的功能规划。| | M5 | 多亏你提醒我，这些因素都和这个房产的价格密切相关，同时也在很⼤程度上对以后房屋拓建有影响。| Thank you for reminding me that these factors are closelyrelated to the price of this property, and also have a great impact onfuture house expansion. | | E6 | Yes, one of my friends had to sold hisproperty at low price, AS one of his neighbour added a secondstorey (阁楼；/'stɔːrɪ/) which blocked the sunlight andaffected his privacy. |是的，我的一个朋友不得不低价卖掉他的房子，因为他的一个邻居加盖了一层阁楼，挡住了阳光，影响了他的隐私。| | M6 | 看来对这个地区做⼀个深⼊调查是有必要的， 如果竞标成功,我会再来请你帮忙。 | It Appears that thorough research is required onthis area, I will come back for your help if I win the auction. |
重点:
拓展：

entry.title: 大选回国
entry.content:
Mr. Gong is speaking over the phone with an officer of the NSWElectoral Commission * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- |--- | | E1 | Good Afternoon, NSW Electoral Commission, how can I helpyou? | 下午好，这里是新南威尔士州选举委员会, 请问有什么可以帮助您的？ || M1 | 午好， 我想请问一下: 这次的州大选我能不能提前投票? | Goodafternoon. May I ask if I can vote early for the upcoming StateElection | | E2 | That's possible, but you need to fulfil certainCriteria before we allow you to do this. Can I ask why youare considering voting early? | 这是可行的，但是你需要满足一定的条件我们才能允许你这么做，我可以问问你想要提前投票的原因么？ | | M2 | 我的哥哥昨晚打电话给我，说我的老母亲突然生病住院了， 我想尽快回去看她，不过我不知道我会在中国待多久。 所以我想在离开澳洲前提前投票。 | Mybrother called me last night to say that my mother has been suddenlyhospitalized. I want to go back to see her as soon aspossible, but I don't know how long I will stay in China. So I want tovote early before leaving Asutralia. | | E3 | Okay, your situation wouldallow you to vote before election day via postal vote. Butare you aware that there are other options available, such as internetvoting or voting at overseas polling stations? | 好的，根据您的情况您可以通过邮寄的方式提前投票。不过您是否知道您还有其他的选择， 比如说网上投票或者在海外投票站投票呢？| | M3 | 那我到不太清楚。 能不能给我解释一下呢？我并不是一定要通过邮寄方式投票, 只是不想再收到选举委员会开的罚单。 |Then I don't know much about this. Can you explain it to me? I don’thave to vote by mail, I just don’t want to receive the fine from theElection Commission again. | | E4 | Certainly. Internetvoting is pretty much self-explanatory. You need to go to theNSW Electoral Commission website, enter your details, answer a fewsimple questions, and then you'll be granted permission to vote online.| 当然， 网上投票是不需要加以说明的。你需要登陆新南威尔士选举委员会的网站， 输入你的信息，回答一些简单的问题， 然后你就便可以网上投票了。 | | M4 |可是我的英语很差， 也不会用电脑上网。 您刚才说的另一种办法是什么呢？ |But my English is poor and I don't know how to use the internet. What'sthe other option you just mentioned? | | E5 | The oter option is to voteat an overseas polling station. These are usually situated inthe Australian embassy and consulates in majorcities, and on election day all you have to do is visit one of them. |另一个选择是在海外投票站投票。这些投票站通常设立在主要城市的澳大利亚领事馆和大使馆， 在选举日，你所需要做的就是去拜访其中一处。 | | M5 | 听上去好像还不错。那么今年在南京有没有这种海外投票站呢？我记得南京好像没有澳大利亚领事馆。 | That sounds good. Is there apolling station in Nanjing this year? I don't think there is anAustralian consulate there. | | E6 | That's true, but thisyear we are setting up a few overseas polling station in someof China's major cities even if they don't have pre-existing consulate.I can give you the address now. | 是没有，不过今年我们在中国的一些主要城市设置了海外投票站，尽管这些城市预先没有存在的领事馆， 我可以现在把地址给你。 | | M6 |多谢了， 我这就去拿纸和笔， 请你稍等一下。 | Thanks a lot. I'll get apen and paper, please hold on a moment. |
重点:

entry.title: 肠镜腹痛
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between the patient, Ms. Wang and the specialistDaniel Anderson. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | ---| | E1 | Good Morning Mr Wang, How are you today? I am doctor DanielAnderson. | 早上好王女士，我还是 Daniel Anderson 医生，你今天感觉如何？| | M1 | 不怎么好， 我今天来看您是因为我总是肚⼦痛，⽽且经常腹泻， 有时候还便秘不知道是怎么回事。 |Not very well unfortunately. I am here today because I always havepain in my stomach and I regularly have diarrhoea,I sometime also have consipation. I don't know what is goingon. | | E2 | How long have you have this symptom, have you had any testdone, is anyone in your family has bowel ((肠道;/'baʊəl/)) problems? |你有这个症状多久了，有没有做过测试，你家里有人有以上问题吗 | | M2 |已经持续三个⽉了， 我没做过什么测试， 我爸爸是得肠癌去世的，我这是得了肠癌么？ | It has been going on for three months. I haven'tdone any tests yet. My father died of bowel cancer. Did Ihave bowel cancer (肠癌)? | | E3 | It is too soon to tell, but if youhave a family history of bowel cancer, you will be at a higher risk ofgetting this disease. I suggest you have a colonoscopy (结肠镜检查;/ˌkəulə'nɔskəpi/) to investigate. |现在说还为时过早，但是如果您有肠癌家族史，则患此病的风险会更高。我建议您进行结肠镜检查。| | M3 | 肠镜， 那要怎么做啊， 您能跟我解释⼀下么， 我从来没做过，有点害怕。 | Colonoscopy (结肠镜检查), how to do it, can youexplain it to me? I am a bit scared. | | E4 | That Physician(内科医生) will insert a long flexible tube into your rectum(直肠), the scope transmit a image of the inside of thecolumn, so that the physician can carefully examine your intestinal(结肠； /ɪnte'staɪn(ə)l/) lining (内膜). |内科医生会在您的直肠中插入一根长的软管，示波器会传输结肠内部的图像，这样内科医生可以仔细检查你的结肠内膜。内科医生会在您的直肠中插入一根长的软管，示波器会传输结肠内部的图像，这样内科医生可以仔细检查你的结肠内膜。| | M4 | 谢谢您的解释， 需要多⻓时间， 会痛么，安不安全，有没有什么⻛险， 需要住院么？ | Thank you for explaining that.How long do colonoscopies take? Do they hurt? Are they safe Are thereany risks and will I need to be hospitalised(住院) | | E5 | A colonoscopy is a Low risk procedure(手术), its takes about 30 minutes, the sedative(镇静剂; /'sedətɪv/) should keep you from feeling muchdiscomfort during the examination and you can go home on the same day. |结肠镜检查是一种低风险的 手术(Procedure)，大约需要30分钟，镇静剂应使您在检查过程中不会感到很大不适，并且您可以在当天回家。| | M5 | 好的谢谢，我明⽩了，做之前有什么忌⼝的么，或者做之前有什么需要注意的么？ | Okay, thank you, I understand now. Isthere anything I should avoid eating ( 忌口 ) /(Having Dietary Restrictions)? Or is thereanything that I should pay attention to, before theprocedure? | | E6 | To prepare for this operation, you may need tofollow a liquid diet (流食) for 3 days. |要为这个手术作准备，您可能需要遵循流质饮⻝3天。 | | M6 |好的医⽣谢谢你， 检查结果出来我再来看您 | Okay, thank youdoctor. I will back to see you once the result are ready. |
重点:
拓展:
classDiagramgraph TD    GP <--> Pathology    GP:  全科医师    GP:  Clinics (诊所)    GP:  Medical Centre (医疗中心)    Pathology: 病理师    Pathology:  Lab (实验室)    Pathology:  Medical Imaging Centre (医学影像中心)    Pathology:  Hospitals (医院)    GP <--> Specialist    Specialist: 专家    Specialist:  Clinics (诊所)    Specialist:  Medical Centre (医疗中心)    Specialist:  Hospitals (医院)    Pathology --> Specialist    GP --> Pharmacy    Specialist --> Pharmacy    Pharmacy: 药房    Specialist --> Centre    Pathology --> Centre    Centre: 中心    Centre: Community Healty Service Centre ()    Centre: -(社区健康服务中心)    Centre: Rehabilitation Centre ()    Centre: -(康复中心)    Centre: -(-)

entry.title: 了解社保
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between a new migrant and Centrelink officer aboutapplying for social support. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | ---| --- | --- | | E1 | Good morning Mrs. Wang. Please have a seat. Iunderstand that you are here to make an enquiry about governmentsupport. How can I help you? |早上好，王女士，请坐。我知道你来这里是想要咨询一下政府补助，我能怎么帮你呢? | | M1 |您好，我对这里的社会保障制度 (Social SecuritySystem)不是很清楚。我是听我邻居说我可以在这里得到一些帮助的。 |Hello, I don’t know much about the social security systemhere. My neighbour told me that I could get some help here. | | E2 |That's right, Mrs. Wang. In Australia, the government provides supportin many ways to make sure residents can get the help they need. Now,could you please tell me about your situation? |没错，王女士。在澳大利亚，政府提供多种补助来保证居民能得到需要得帮助。现在，能请你告诉我你的情况吗?| | M2 |我英语不好，不好找工作，所以我丈夫是家里的顶梁柱。他原先在一家家居用品店做销售。| It’s difficult for me to find a job because of my poor English, so myhusband is the main income earner. He used to be a salesmanin a home ware shop. | | E3 | You said he used to work there. Whathappened? | 你说他以前在那里工作，（后来）发生了什么事呢? | | M3 |一年前，我丈夫和店长发生了一点冲突，他一冲动就辞职了。那之后，因为没有之前雇主的推荐，他很难找到理想的工作。| My husband had a conflict with the manager a year ago and quit in theheat of the moment. Since then, he has had difficulty findingan ideal job without a reference letter from his previous employer. | |E4 | What do you mean by an ideal job? Do you have specific requirementsabout the pay, position or other matters? |你指的理想的工作是什么意思呢？你对工资、职位或是其他事情有特定的要求吗?| | M4 |我丈夫身体不好，没法干重体力活。销售这类工作比较适合他，但是薪水很重要，毕竟要养活全家呀。| He is not physically fit so he can’t perform physicallabour. Sales suits him well, but since he has a family tofeed, the salary is a very important factor. | | E5 | Mrs. Wang, Iunderstand your situation. However, we do encourage people to rely ontheir own means to get Reemployed. |王女士，我了解你的处境了。然而，我们鼓励人们通过自己的方法来重新就业。 || M5 | 我丈夫也想尽快找到工作的，他现在偶尔做些零散工作，勉强养家。 | Myhusband also wants to find a job AS soon AS possible. At the moment, hedoes some casual work occasionally; however the income isbarely enough to support the family. | | E6 | Mrs. Wang,Centrelink does offer help to people who experience financialhardship. However, the decision will be made after we conduct anassessment. At the same time, we can also provide help to people who arelooking for work. | 王女士，社会福利联络中心(Centrelink)给有财务困难的人提供帮助。但是要经过评估以后才能够做出决定。同时，我们也为那些找工作的人提供帮助。| | M6 | 那太好了。下次我一定要让他来咨询一下如何找工的事情。 | Great!Next time I will definitely ask him to enquire about how to find a job.|
重点:

entry.title: 工作歧视
entry.content:
This is a dialogue between an employee and a legal consultant about aworkplace discrimination. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- |--- | --- | | E1 | Good morning, Mrs. Huang. I am the consultant takingcare of your case. What can I do for you? |早上好，黄女士。我是你案件的顾问，有什么可以帮到您？ | | M1 | 律师,你好。我来是想咨询一下关于歧视的问题我觉得我受到了不公正的待遇。 |Hello. I‘m here to enquire about discrimination. I think I have beentreated unfairly. | | E2 | I am sorry to hear that, Mrs. Huang Could youplease give me some more details? Then we will see if the treatment hasbeen unfair |很抱歉听到这些，黄女士。请问您能不能再给我一些细节，然后我们再来看看是否有不公平的待遇| | M2 | 当然可以。我在一家公司做全职文秘。工作两年后，我决定要小孩。合同上说我是有产假的。可是等我休完产假回来，我的职位已经有人顶替了 | Certainly. I am a fulltime secretary in a company. Having worked for two years, I decided tohave a baby. According to the contract, I have (/mə'tɜːnɪtɪ/)Maternity Leave. But after returning from leave, my positionhad been taken by someone else. | | E3 | What happened then? Didyou talk to your employer about it? How did your employer respond ？ |接下来发生了什么呢？您有没有跟您的雇主谈过这个事情呢？您的雇主是怎么回复的呢？| | M3 | 我去找过经理。他说，我离开的那段时间，公司缺人手，必须招新人。顶替我职位的人现在已经适应了这份工作， 不能让她走 . | Italked to the manager. He said the company was understaffedand had to recruit a new person during my leave. The new person hasadapted well to the job so they don’t want to make her leave | | E4 |Then how was your problem solved? Did the company dismiss you or was itsettled in another way? |您的问题后来是怎么解决的呢？您的公司解雇了您或者把您安排到其他的岗位呢？| | M4 | 我现在还是可以回去上班，但是由全职改为兼职，一周只有20小时。我的经济压力大。我现在这样的情况能算是工作场所的歧视行为吗？| I can still work there, but only part-time, not full-time, and onlyfor 20 hours a week. I am under a lot of financial pressure now. Is thiskind of situation considered to be workplace discrimination? | | E5 |Unlawful workplace discrimination> occurs when an employertakes adverse action (不利的, 不好的行为) against a personwho is an employee or prospective employee (准雇员;潜在雇员).It covers various conditions which include altering an employee’sposition to their detriment (造成损害; 'detrɪm(ə)nt/). |非法的工作场所歧视是指当雇主对雇员或者潜在雇员做出不好的行为。这涵盖很多种情况， 包括将员工调整到对员工不利的岗位。 | | M5 |这么说来，我受到的待遇的确是不公平的。可是我现在应该怎么办呢?我又不能在公司闹，万一他们把我解雇怎么办？ | So that means I have beensubjected to unfair treatment. But what should I do now? I cannotmake a scene at work. What if they fire me? | | E6 | You donot have to take any aggressive action. All you need to do is apply foran investigation. If it is found that your employer has discriminatorypractices that are linked to adverse actions for employees, TheFair Work Ombudsman may take enforcement action. |您不用采取任何的过激行为。您所要做的就是申请一个调查。如果发现您的雇主做出对雇员不利的并和歧视有关的行为，申诉专员可能采取强制措施。| | M6 | 好的。那我就去申诉专员那里投诉，我要捍卫自己的权益。 | Ok. I’llmake a complaint to the ombudsman. I would like toprotect my rights and interests. |
重点:

entry.title: 签证逾期
entry.content:
An immigration officer confronts someone about a visa overstay. * * *| ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | E1 | Mr. Li, Iunderstand that you have overstayed a 3-month tourist visa and you'vebeen working illegally. Do you have anything to say aboutthis? |李先生，我知道您已逾期3个月的旅游签证，并且一直在非法工作。您对此有话要说吗？| | M1 | 我不知道谁给你的这些信息， 这些都不是真的。 | I don't know whogave you this information. It's not true | | E2 | It is in your bestinterest to cooperate with us. We have evidence to support these claims.You've broken the law and it is very likely you will bedeported. |与我们合作是对你自己最有利的选择。我们有证据支持这些说法。你违反了法律，很可能会被驱逐出境。| | M2 | 不行， 你不可以把我送回到那里，我已经什么都没有了，我必须呆在这， 我想在这个国家安家。 | No, you can't send me back, I havenothing left there, I have to stay here, I want to settledown in this country. | | E3 | The conditions were clearly explained toyou when you were granted the tourist visa. You signed a documentstating that you are fully aware of your obligations. |当你获得旅游签证时， 已经清楚地向你说明了这些条件。你签署了一份文件，声明你完全了解自己的义务。 | | M3 |我记得我签了一个什么文件。 但从那以后我已经忘了这件事和文件的内容了。我以为那只是一个简单的仪式， 在我来到这里之后就不会再被约束了。 | Iremember I signed a document and since then I've forgotten about it, andthe contents of the document. I thought it was just a simpleformality, and after I came here I would not be restrainedanymore. | | E4 | There seems to be some degree of ignoranceon your part, deliberate or not, what explanation do you havefor overstaying your tourist visa? |您似乎有某种程度的不知情，有意或无意，您对逾期持有旅游签证有何解释？| | M4 | 我不是故意要违法的。 我现在认识到我已经逾期滞留了。但我这样做是有正当理由的。 我有一个小女儿， 她天生得了兔唇。我想在澳大利亚和她呆在一起, 这样我的女儿会得到比较好的治疗。 | I did notintentionally violate (违反) the law. I now realize that Ihave been overstayed. But I have legitimate reasons for doingso. I have a little daughter who was born with rabbit lips(兔唇) / Harelip (/heə'lɪp/) . I want to stay with herin Australia. This way my daughter will get better treatment. | | E5 | Isee. I can sympathise with your situation, but you mustunderstand you went about solving your problem in the wrong way. |我明白了。我能理解你的处境，但你必须明白你是用了错误的方法去解决问题。 || M5 | 但我不得不工作否则我没有办法在这里生存。我也不会有钱给我女儿做手术。 求求你了， 就让我呆在这里吧。 | But I haveto work or I won't be able to survive here and I won't havethe money to support my daughter's surgery, I begging you,just let me stay here | | E6 | There's little I can do. Your case may begiven special consideration but you have to set out therelevant details on this form first and then wait for a decision to bemade. |我无能为力。你的个案子可能会得到特别考虑，但你必须先在此表格上列出有关的详情，然后等待作出决定| | M6 | 那我的家人和我的工作怎么办呢？ 他们都指着我呢！ | What about myfamily and my job? They are all count on me ( 指望我)! |
重点:

entry.title: 出手伤人
entry.content:
Mr. Wang, who was charged with common assault, is speaking with apolice officer. * * * | ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- || E1 | Mr. Wang, you are not obliged to say or do anything unless youwish to do so, but whatever you say or do may be used against you incourt. Do you understand? | 王先生， 你不需要说或者做任何事，除非你自愿， 但是你所说和所做的一切都有可能会成为呈堂证供。 你明白么？ || M1 | 明白了。 我已经说过了， 我完全是处于自卫， 我怎么可能主动打人呢？| I understand. I already told you that I did it out ofself-defence. Why would I assault someone? (How can I takethe initiative to hit someone?) | | E2 | According to Mr Smith,you asked them to end their party and they refused. After which youassaulted his friend, causing grievous bodily harm (严重人体伤害;重伤;). | 根据史密斯先生的笔录， 你让他和他的朋友们们结束聚会，但他们拒绝了。 然后你殴打了他的朋友， 造成严重人身伤害。 | | M2 |Missing | Missing | | E3 | According to Mr Smith,you started the fight. They claim they tried to explain, but youwouldn't listen and were quite aggressive. | 嗯，根据史密斯先生说， 是你先动的手。 他们当时想和你解释， 但是你听不进去，而且态度很恶劣。 | | M3 | 我承认我当时挺激动，但是是因为我的宝宝在睡觉， 而且我绝对没有先动手。 他们那时候都喝醉了。我敢打赌他们还抽了大麻。 | I admit I was quite upset, but that's becausemy baby was sleeping. I absolutely did not start the fight. They wereall drunk. Bet they had even been taking Marijuana (大麻/ˌmærɪ'hwɑːnə/) | | E4 | The police officer states that one of MrSmith's friends was scratched by the ring on your hand. Thevictim also claimed to have abdominal pain (腹痛) |根据警官的笔录， 史密斯先生的一位朋友被你的戒指划伤了。而且受害人还声称腹部疼痛。 | | M4 | 那我呢？ 我也受伤了啊！ 你看，这是我手臂上的淤青。 警官你可千万不要听信他的一面之词啊， 我是正当防卫。| What aobut me? I am injured too! Look at the bruises on myarm. Officer, don't just listen to his side of the story. I was actingin self-defence. | | E5 | You should've told the police officer lastnight. You've been charged with commonassault通袭击罪 resulting in grievous bodilyharm严重身体伤害. You are scheduled to appear beforeHurstville Local Court on the 2 of August, 2010. |嗯昨晚你应该向现场的警官反应这个情况。 你被控犯有普通袭击罪，并造成严重身体伤害。 你将于2010年8月2日在Hurstville赫斯特维尔 地方法院出庭。 | | M5 |为什么我怎么解释你们都不明白呢？既然是这样，你能不能告诉我我接下来该怎么办，我现在能不能回家或是联系我的律师？ | Why can’t you understandwhat I’m saying to you? Well, since this is the way things are, couldyou tell me what I should do next? Am I allowed to go back home orcontact my lawyer? | | E6 | You can be released on bailotherwise you'll be held in police custody until the trial. You may haveyour solicitor represent you in court. | 你可以获得保释，不然你会一直被警察收押， 直到开庭。 你可以让你的律师代表你上庭。 | | M6| 好的， 我要打电话给我的律师， 让他们来帮我办理保释手续，以后有什么事情直接找我律师谈。 | Ok. I need to call my solicitor and askhim to bail me out / Apply for bail formalities.Please talk to him directly if anything else comes up. |
重点:

entry.title: 失眠就医
entry.content:
A patient is seeking help from a GP about a sleeping disorder. * * *| ID | Original | Translated | | --- | --- | --- | | A1 | Good morning.Please have a seat. You look very tired. problem What’s the Problem? | || Z1 | 我最近不太容易入睡。我觉得累，但是却睡不着。就算到了后半夜终于睡着了，也睡得很浅。到了白天，就无精打采。| I’ve been havingdifficulty falling asleep. I feel tired but I can’t fall asleep. Even ifI finally fall asleep after midnight, my sleep is very light. By themorning, I feel exhausted. | | A2 | How long have you had this problem?Is there anything that may have caused this sleeping disorder? Havethere been any significant changes in your life recently? | |
| Z2 | 三个月了。我觉得没有。只是最近比较忙，别的也没有什么事情。 |Three months. I don’t think so. I’ve just been very busy lately. That’sall. | | A3 | What about your diet? Have you changed your diet? Youknow, changing diets may affect your sleeping patterns. | |
| Z3 | 没有。最近食欲倒是有些下降。体重也有减轻。但最让我头痛的问题还是睡不着觉。我晚上睡不着，白天就觉得更加累，而且精神无 法集中。 | IDI have however been losing my appetite and I have lost some weight. Butthe thing troubling me most is not being able to fall asleep. If I can’tsleep at night, I feel more tired during the day and I can’tconcentrate. | | A4 | There are many reasons for the unexplained weightloss and poor appetite. Have you taken any sleeping pills for this? Doyou get headaches? | |
| Z4 | 试过安眠药，但是对我一点儿都不起作用。 我偶尔会头痛，但都不太严重。我只要闭目养神一会儿头痛就好了。 | I’ve tried sleeping pills butthey did not work for me. I get headaches occasionally but they are nottoo severe and the pain goes way if I close my eyes and have a rest. ||
| A5 | Well, there is nothing to worry about. You are just a littleexhausted from overworking, and it may have caused some pressure thatyou are not aware of. | | | Z5 |我该怎么办呢？我需要吃更好的安眠药吗？我怕我现在安眠药吃多 了，以后会有药物依赖。 而且中国不是有一句俗话叫是药三分毒 嘛。 | What shouldI do then? Do I need to take more effective sleeping pills? I’m worriedthat if I take too many sleeping pills I will develop a drug dependency.And isn’t there a Chinese proverb that says, “no medicine is withoutside effects”? | |
| A6 | You need more rest. You’re experiencing stress as a result ofpressures at work, which is causing your insomnia. You don’t have totake sleeping pills at this stage. Milk will help. If you still havetrouble sleeping after one week, you could start taking sleeping pills.| |
| Z6 | 好的，大夫，我会照你说的去做。谢谢你，再见！ | Alright, I’ll doas you say. Thanks, goodbye! | |

entry.content:
